short_text: The Surah takes its name from the word al-muddaththir in the first verse. This also is only a name, not a title of its subject matter.
text: The Surah takes its name from the word al-muddaththir in the first verse. This also is only a name, not a title of its subject matter.
Period of Revelation

The first seven verses of this Surah belong to the earliest period at Makkah. Even according to some traditions which have been related in Bukhari, Muslim, Tirmidhi, Musnad Ahmad, etc., on the authority of Hadrat Jabir bin Abdullah, these are the very earliest verses of the Qur'an to be revealed to the Holy Prophet (upon whoa be peace). But the Muslim Ummah almost unanimously agreed that the earliest Revelation to the Holy Prophet (upon whom be peace) consisted of the first five verses of Surah Al-Alaq(XCVI). However, what is established by authentic traditions is that after this first Revelation, no Revelation came down to the Holy Prophet (upon whom be peace) for quite some time. Then, when it was resumed, it started with theme verses of Surah Al- Muddaththir. Imam Zuhri has given the following details of it:

"Revelation to the Holy Prophet remained suspended for quite some time, and it was such a period of deep grief and distress for him that he started going early to the tops of the mountains to throw himself down from them. But whenever he stood on the edge of a peak, the Angel Gabriel would appear and tell him that he was Allah's Prophet. This would console him and restore to him full peace of mind." (Ibn Jarir).
After this Imam Zuhri relates the following tradition on the authority of Hadrat Jabir bin Abdullah:

"The Holy Messenger of Allah describing the period of falrat al-wahi (break in revelation) said: One day when I was passing on the way, I suddenly heard a call from heaven. I raised my head and saw that the same Angel who had visited me in the Cave of Hira was sitting on a throne between heaven and earth. This struck terror in my heart, and reaching home quickly, I said: 'Cover me up, cover me up'. So the people of the house covered me up with a quilt (or blanket). At that time Allah sent down the Revelation: Ya ayyuhal-Muddaththiru... From then on revelation became intense and continuous." (Bukhari, Muslim Musnad Ahmad, Ibn Jarir).

The rest of the Surah (vv. 8-56) was revealed when the first Hajj season came after public preaching of Islam had begun in Makkah. This has been fully well described in the Sirah by Ibn Hisham and we shall cite it below.
Theme and Subject Matter

As has been explained above, the earliest Revelation to the Holy Prophet (upon whom be peace) consisted of the first five verses of Surah Al-Alaq, in which it had been Said: "Read (O Prophet), in the name of your Lord, Who created: created man from a clot of congealed blood. Read: and your Lord is Most Generous, Who taught knowledge by the pen, taught man what he did not know."

This was the first experience of Revelation met with suddenly by the Holy Prophet (upon whom be peace). in this message it was not told what great mission he had been entrusted with and what duties he had to perk form in future. He was only initiated into it and then left alone for a time so that the great strain this experience had caused should pass away and he should mentally become prepared to receive the Revelation and perform the prophetic mission in the future. After this intermission when Revelation Was resumed, the first seven verses of this Surah Were revealed:In these he Was for the first time commanded to arise and warn the people of the consequences of the way of life they were following and to proclaim the greatness of God in the world where others were being magnified without any right. Along with that he was given this instruction: The demand of the Unique mission that you have to perform, now is that your life should be pure in every respect and you should carry out the duty of reforming your people sincerely irrespective of any worldly gain. Then, in the last sentence, he was exhorted to endure with patience, for the sake of his Lord, all the hardships and troubles that he might have to face while performing his mission.

In the implementation of this Divine Command when the Holy Messenger of Allah began to preach Islam and recite the Qur'anic Surahs revealed successively, the people of Makkah felt alarmed, and it provoked a great storm of opposition and hostility. A few months passed in this state until the Hajj season approached. The people of Makkah feared that if Muhammad (upon whom be Allah's peace) started visiting the caravans of the pilgrims coming from all over Arabia at their halting places and reciting the spell binding and unique Revelations of the Qur'an in their assemblies on the occasion of Hajj, his message would reach every part of Arabia and influence countless people. Therefore, the Quraish chiefs held a conference and settled that they would start a propaganda campaign against the Holy Prophet (upon whom be peace) among the pilgrims as soon as they arrived.

After they had agreed on this, Walid bin al-Mughirah said to the assembled people: "If you said contradictory things about Muhammad (upon whom be Allah's peace and blessings), we all would lose our trust among the people. Therefore, let us agree upon one opinion, which we should all say without dispute.

Some people said that they would call Muhammad (upon whom be Allah's peace and blessings) a soothsayer. Walid said: “No, by God, be is not a soothsayer. We have seen the soothsayers: what they murmur and what they utter has no remote resemblance with the Qur'an.”

Some other people said: “Then we say he is possessed.” Walid said: He is not a possessed one: we have seen mad and insane people; the way one talks disjointedly and behaves foolishly in that state is known to all: who would believe that what Muhammad (upon whom be peace) presented was the incoherent speech of a madman?”
The people said: “Then we say he is a poet.” Walid said: “No, he is not a poet, for we know poetry in all its forms, and what he presents conforms to no form of it.”

The people said: “Then he is a sorcerer.” Walid said: “He is no sorcerer either: we have seen sorcerers and we also know what methods they adopt for their sorcery. This also does not apply to Muhammad.”

Then he said: "Whichever of these things you said about Muhammad, it would be known to be a false accusation. By God, his speech is sweet, his root is deep and his branches are fruitful.” At this Abu Jahl urging on Walid said: “Your people will never be pleased with you unless you say something about Muhammad.” He said: “Let me think over it awhile.”

Then, after prolonged thought and consideration, he said: “The nearest thing to the truth is that you tell the Arabs that he is a sorcerer, who has brought a message by which he separates a man from his father; and from his brother, and from his wife and children, and from his family.” They all agreed on what Walid had proposed.

Then, according to a scheme the men of Quraish spread among the pilgrims in the Hajj season and they warned everyone they met of the sorcery of Muhammad (upon whom be peace) and of his stirring up divisions in the families by it." But the result was that by their this plan the Quraish chiefs themselves made the name of the Holy Messenger known throughout Arabia. (Ibn Hisham, pp. 288-289. That Walid had made this proposal on the insistence of Abu Jahl has been related by Ibn Jarir in his Tafsir on the authority of Ikrimah).
This same event has been reviewed and commented upon in the second section of this Surah. The sequence of its contents is as follows:
In vv. 8-10 the deniers of Truth have been warned, saying: "You will see the evil result of what you are doing today on the Resurrection Day."

In vv. 11-26, without naming Walid bin al-Mughirah, it has been told how Allah had blessed him and how inimical he proved to be to true Faith. In this connection, his mental conflict has been portrayed, telling that, on the one hand, he was fully convinced of the truth of Muhammad (upon whom be Allah's peace and blessings) and the Qur'an, but, on the other, he did not want to risk his leadership and position among his people. Therefore, not only he did not believe himself but after a long-drawn-out conflict with his conscience he also came out with the proposal that in order to restrain the people from believing the Qur'an should be branded as magic. After exposing his evil nature, it has been said: "Notwithstanding such evil inclinations and misdeeds, this person desires that he should be further blessed, whereas he has now become worthy of Hell, and never of further blessings."
In vv. 27-48, the dreadfulness of Hell has been depicted and it has been explained as to people of what character and morals really deserve it.

In vv. 49-53, the root cause of the disbelievers' aversion has been pointed out, saying: "Since they are fearless of the Hereafter, and look upon this worldly life as an end in itself, they flee from the Qur'an as though they were wild asses fleeing away from the lion: therefore, they propose unreasonable conditions for believing, whereas even if each and every condition of theirs was fulfilled, they could not advance even an inch on the way of Faith with their denial of the Hereafter."

In conclusion, it has been explicitly stated: Allah does not stand in need of anybody's faith that He may fulfill his conditions. The Qur'an is an admonition that has been presented before the people openly; now whoever wills may accept it. Allah has a right that the people should fear His disobedience and He alone has the power to forgive the one who adopts piety and an attitude of God consciousness even though one may have committed many acts of disobedience in the past.
description: The surah that opens by addressing the enwrapped Prophet as the Shrouded Messenger. It takes its name from the word “wrapped in mantle” (muddaththir) in verse 1. The first verses of this surah (verse 1 .) were revealed after one of the Prophets first encounter with the Angel of Revelation in the Cave of Ḥirāʾ. The surah goes on, in a section from a later period, to remind the obstinate disbelievers of their fate on the Day of Judgement (verse 8 .) and a specific opponent of the Prophet is singled out (verse 11 .). The end of the surah (verse 39 .) exposes the foolishness of the disbelievers” attitude to the Revelation and the Day of Resurrection.The surah is also known as: The Cloaked One, The Enfolded, The Enfolded One, The Enveloped, The Man Wearing a Cloak, The Mantled Messenger, Wrapped in his Cloak.

Albanian.verse 74:6: Dhe mos ndajë me qëllim që të marrësh më shumë!
Albanian.verse 74:7: Dhe për hir të Zotit tënd, duro
Albanian.verse 74:8: e, kur të fryhet në buri –
Albanian.verse 74:9: do të jetë ato ditë e rëndë,
Albanian.verse 74:10: për jobesimtarët nuk do të jetë e lehtë.
Albanian.verse 74:11: Lemëni Mua dhe atë që e kam krijuar Unë, vet,
Albanian.verse 74:12: dhe i kam dhënë pasuri kolosale,
Albanian.verse 74:13: dhe djemtë që i ka të pranishëm,
Albanian.verse 74:14: dhe nderë e prestigj i kam dhuruar
Albanian.verse 74:15: dhe përpos kësaj - dëshiron, që Unë t’ia zmadhojë (të mirat)!
Albanian.verse 74:16: Jo, kurrsesi! Me të vërtetë, ai është mohues kryeneç i ajeteve Tona;
Albanian.verse 74:17: e Unë do ta ngarkojë atë me dënime të rënda,
Albanian.verse 74:18: sepse, ka paramenduar dhe ka kurdisur (kundër Kur’anit), -
Albanian.verse 74:19: dhe, qoftë mallkuar, si e ka kurdisur!
Albanian.verse 74:20: dhe sërish – edhe njëherë, qoftë mallkuar, si e ka kurdisur! –
Albanian.verse 74:22: e, u vrejt dhe iu mrrol (fytyra)
Albanian.verse 74:23: dhe u kthye (nga mendimi i drejtë) dhe u kapardis,
Albanian.verse 74:24: dhe tha: “Ky (Kur’ani) nuk është gjë tjetër, përpos magji trashëguese,
Albanian.verse 74:27: e kush të shpjegon ty se çka është Sekari?
Albanian.verse 74:28: Ai nuk lë gjë dhe i përfshinë të gjithë (i djegë)
Albanian.verse 74:29: lëkurat iu bënë të zeza (nga të djegurit)
Albanian.verse 74:31: Na, kemi bërë rojtarë të zjarrit (engjëj) dhe kemi caktuar numrin e tyre, vetëm për t’i provuar jobesimtarët; për ‘tu bindur njerëzit, të cilëve, u është dhënë Libri, që t’u shtohet (forcohet) besimi atyre që besojnë, e mos të dyshojnë, ata, të cilëve u është dhënë Libri, - dhe për të thënë ata që janë zemërkëqinj (hipokrit) dhe jobesimtarë: “Ç’ka dashur Zoti (të tregojë) me këtë shembull?” Kështu, Perëndia i lë në hutim (dhe në humbje) ata që do, dhe në rrugë të drejtë e udhëzon atë që don. Askush tjetër, përveç Tij, nuk e di numrin e ushtrisë së Zotit tënd. Kjo është vetëm këshillë për njerëzit.
Albanian.verse 74:35: ajo (skëterra), me të vërtetë, është njëra nga fatkeqësitë më të mëdha,
Albanian.verse 74:37: për ata nga ju që dëshirojnë të bëjnë mirë ose të abstenojnë (në këtë)!
Albanian.verse 74:38: Çdo njeri është peng (përgjegjës) për veprat e veta,
Albanian.verse 74:40: të cilët në kopshtijet e xhenneti i pyesin fajtorët:
Albanian.verse 74:42: “Çka u ka sjellë juve në Sekar (Skëterrë)?”
Albanian.verse 74:43: Ata do të përgjigjen: “Nuk kemi qenë nga ata që kanë bërë namaz
Albanian.verse 74:44: dhe prej atyre që i kanë ushqyer të varfërit
Albanian.verse 74:45: dhe jemi lëshuar në biseda të kota me djerraditësit (badihavxhinjtë),
Albanian.verse 74:46: dhe kemi përgënjeshtruar Ditën e Kijametit,
Albanian.verse 74:48: Kurrfarë ndërmjetësimi i ndërmjetësuesve nuk do t’u ndihmojë atyre.
Albanian.verse 74:49: E, përse shmangën ata nga këshillimi,
Albanian.verse 74:50: thua se janë gomarë të egër,
Albanian.verse 74:51: të frikësuar, që kanë ikur prej luanit.
Albanian.verse 74:52: Po! Çdonjëri nga ata do të kërkojë që t’i jepet rregjistri i qartë (nga Zoti).
Albanian.verse 74:53: Kurrsesi, pasi që ata nuk i frikohen Ditës së Kijametit!
Albanian.verse 74:54: Ai (Kur’ani), në të vërtetë, është këshillë,
Albanian.verse 74:55: dhe kush të dojë, le ta pranojë,
Albanian.verse 74:56: e këshillohen vetëm ata që do Perëndia; Ai është i vetmi të cilit duhet t’i druajmë dhe Ai është i vetmi falës.

Amharic.verse 74:9: ይህም (ጊዜ) ያ ቀን አስቸጋሪ ቀን ነው፡፡
Amharic.verse 74:11: አንድ ኾኖ ከፈጠርኩት ሰው ጋር ተዎኝ (እኔ እበቃሃለሁ)፡፡
Amharic.verse 74:14: ለእርሱም (ኑሮውን) መዘርጋትን የዘረጋሁለት (ከኾነ ሰው ገር ተዎኝ)፡፡
Amharic.verse 74:16: ይከልከል፤ እርሱ ለአንቀጾቻችን በእርግጥ ተቃዋሚ ነበር፡፡
Amharic.verse 74:24: አለም «ይህ (ከሌላ) የሚቀዳ ድግምት እንጅ ሌላ አይደለም፡፡
Amharic.verse 74:31: የእሳትንም ዘበኞች መላእክት እንጅ ሌላ አላደረግንም፡፡ ቁጥራቸውንም ለእነዚያ ለካዱት መፈተኛ እንጅ አላደረግንም፡፡ እነዚያ መጽሐፍን የተሰጡት እንዲያረጋግጡ፣ እነዚያም ያመኑት እምነትን እንዲጨምሩ፣ እነዚያም መጽሐፍን የተሰጡትና ምእምናኖቹ እንዳይጠራጠሩ፣ እነዚያም በልቦቻቸው ውስጥ በሽታ ያለባቸው (መናፍቃን)፣ ከሓዲዎችም አላህ በዚህ (ቁጥር) ምን ምሳሌ ሽቷል? እንዲሉ (እንጅ አላደረግንም)፡፡ እንደዚሁ አላህ የሚሻውን ያጠምማል፡፡ የሚሻውንም ያቀናል፡፡ የጌታህንም ሰራዊት (ልክ) ከርሱ በቀር ማንም አያውቅም፡፡ እርሷም (የሰቀር እሳት) ለሰዎች መገሰጫ እንጅ ሌላ አይደለችም፡፡
Amharic.verse 74:37: ከእናንተ (ወደ በጎ ነገር) መቅደምን ወይም ወደ ኋላ መቅረትን ለሻ ሰው (አስፈራሪ ስትኾኑ)፡፡
Amharic.verse 74:38: ነፍስ ሁሉ በሠራችው ሥራ ተያዥ ናት፡፡
Amharic.verse 74:50: እነርሱ ልክ ደንባሪዎች የሜዳ አህዮች ይመስላሉ፡፡
Amharic.verse 74:52: ይልቁንም ከእነርሱ እያንዳንዱ ሰው ሁሉ የተዘረጉ ጽሑፎችን እንዲስሰጥ ይፈልጋል፡፡
Amharic.verse 74:56: አላህም ካልሻ በስተቀር አይገሠጹም፡፡ እርሱ (አላህ) የመፈራት ባለቤት የምሕረትም ባለቤት ነው፡፡

Arabic.verse 74:31: (ِرَشَبْلِل ٰىَرْكِذ اَّلِإ َيِه اَمَو ۚ َوُه اَّلِإ َكِّبَر َدوُنُج ُمَلْعَي اَمَو ۚ ُءاَشَي نَم يِدْهَيَو ُءاَشَي نَم ُهَّللا ُّلِضُي َكِلَٰذَك ۚ اًلَثَم اَذَٰهِب ُهَّللا َداَرَأ اَذاَم َنوُرِفاَكْلاَو ٌضَرَّم مِهِبوُلُق يِف َنيِذَّلا َلوُقَيِلَو ۙ َنوُنِمْؤُمْلاَو َباَتِكْلا اوُتوُأ َنيِذَّلا َباَتْرَي اَلَو ۙ اًناَميِإ اوُنَمآ َنيِذَّلا َداَدْزَيَو َباَتِكْلا اوُتوُأ َنيِذَّلا َنِقْيَتْسَيِل اوُرَفَك َنيِذَّلِّل ًةَنْتِف اَّلِإ ْمُهَتَّدِع اَنْلَعَج اَمَو ۙ ًةَكِئاَلَم اَّلِإ ِراَّنلا َباَحْصَأ اَنْلَعَج اَمَو

Azerbaijani.verse 74:11: Məni yaratdığım kimsə ilə tək burax;
Azerbaijani.verse 74:14: və onu hər cür imkanlarla təmin etdim.
Azerbaijani.verse 74:15: Bunlara baxmayaraq, o, yenə də əlavə etməyimi arzulayır.
Azerbaijani.verse 74:16: Xeyr! Çünki o, ayələrimizi inadla inkar edir.
Azerbaijani.verse 74:17: Mən onu sərt bir yoxuşa sürükləyəcəyəm.
Azerbaijani.verse 74:19: Ona ölüm olsun! Necə qərara gəldi?
Azerbaijani.verse 74:20: Sonra yenə ona ölüm olsun! Gör nə qərara gəldi?
Azerbaijani.verse 74:23: Sonra da arxasını çevirib təkəbbür göstərdi
Azerbaijani.verse 74:24: və dedi: “Bu, sehrbazlardan eşidilib təkrarlanan sehrdən başqa bir şey deyildir!
Azerbaijani.verse 74:27: Sən haradan biləsən ki, Səqər nədir?!
Azerbaijani.verse 74:30: Onun üzərində on doqquz gözətçi mələk vardır.
Azerbaijani.verse 74:31: Biz Cəhənnəm gözətçilərini yalnız mələklərdən etdik və onların sayını on doqquz etdik ki, bu, kafirlər üçün ancaq bir sınaq olsun, özlərinə Kitab verilənlər yəqinlik hasil etsinlər, iman gətirənlərin imanı artsın, Kitab verilənlər və möminlər haqqa şübhə etməsinlər və qəlblərində xəstəlik olanlar və kafirlər: “Allah bu məsəllə nə demək istəyir?”– desinlər. Allah istədiyi kimsəni belə azdırır, istədiyini də doğru yola yönəldir. Sənin Rəbbinin qoşunları barədə yalnız Özü bilir. Bu, bəşəriyyət üçün ancaq bir xatırlatmadır.
Azerbaijani.verse 74:34: And olsun ağarmaqda olan sübh çağına!
Azerbaijani.verse 74:35: Doğrudan da o Cəhənnəm ən böyük fəlakətdir,
Azerbaijani.verse 74:37: həm də sizlərdən yaxşı işlər görüb irəli çıxmaq və ya günah edib geriyə düşmək istəyənlər üçün.
Azerbaijani.verse 74:38: Hər bir kəs qazandığının girovuna çevrilir,
Azerbaijani.verse 74:45: Batil sözlər danışanlarla birlikdə biz də danışardıq,
Azerbaijani.verse 74:46: və Haqq-hesab gününü yalan hesab edərdik –
Azerbaijani.verse 74:48: Odur ki, şəfaət edənlərin şəfaəti onlara fayda verməz.
Azerbaijani.verse 74:49: Onlara nə olub ki, nəsihətdən üz döndərirlər?
Azerbaijani.verse 74:52: Əksinə, onlardan hər biri vəhy olunmuş səhifələrin məhz ona verilməsini istəyir.
Azerbaijani.verse 74:56: Bilin ki, Allah istəmədikcə onlar xatırlaya bilməzlər. Mütləq qüdrətindən qorxub çəkinməyə layiq olan da, bağışlamağa qadir olan da Odur!

Bengali.verse 74:6: অধিক প্রতিদানের আশায় অন্যকে কিছু দিবেন না।
Bengali.verse 74:7: এবং আপনার পালনকর্তার উদ্দেশে সবর করুন।
Bengali.verse 74:11: যাকে আমি অনন্য করে সৃষ্টি করেছি, তাকে আমার হাতে ছেড়ে দিন।
Bengali.verse 74:15: এরপরও সে আশা করে যে, আমি তাকে আরও বেশী দেই।
Bengali.verse 74:16: কখনই নয়! সে আমার নিদর্শনসমূহের বিরুদ্ধাচরণকারী।
Bengali.verse 74:17: আমি সত্ত্বরই তাকে শাস্তির পাহাড়ে আরোহণ করাব।
Bengali.verse 74:18: সে চিন্তা করেছে এবং মনঃস্থির করেছে,
Bengali.verse 74:19: ধ্বংস হোক সে, কিরূপে সে মনঃস্থির করেছে!
Bengali.verse 74:20: আবার ধ্বংস হোক সে, কিরূপে সে মনঃস্থির করেছে!
Bengali.verse 74:22: অতঃপর সে ভ্রূকুঞ্চিত করেছে ও মুখ বিকৃত করেছে,
Bengali.verse 74:23: অতঃপর পৃষ্ঠপ্রদশন করেছে ও অহংকার করেছে।
Bengali.verse 74:24: এরপর বলেছেঃ এতো লোক পরস্পরায় প্রাপ্ত জাদু বৈ নয়,
Bengali.verse 74:28: এটা অক্ষত রাখবে না এবং ছাড়বেও না।
Bengali.verse 74:31: আমি জাহান্নামের তত্ত্বাবধায়ক ফেরেশতাই রেখেছি। আমি কাফেরদেরকে পরীক্ষা করার জন্যেই তার এই সংখ্যা করেছি-যাতে কিতাবীরা দৃঢ়বিশ্বাসী হয়, মুমিনদের ঈমান বৃদ্ধি পায় এবং কিতাবীরা ও মুমিনগণ সন্দেহ পোষণ না করে এবং যাতে যাদের অন্তরে রোগ আছে, তারা এবং কাফেররা বলে যে, আল্লাহ এর দ্বারা কি বোঝাতে চেয়েছেন। এমনিভাবে আল্লাহ যাকে ইচ্ছা পথভ্রষ্ট করেন এবং যাকে ইচ্ছা সৎপথে চালান। আপনার পালনকর্তার বাহিনী সম্পর্কে একমাত্র তিনিই জানেন এটা তো মানুষের জন্যে উপদেশ বৈ নয়।
Bengali.verse 74:33: শপথ রাত্রির যখন তার অবসান হয়,
Bengali.verse 74:34: শপথ প্রভাতকালের যখন তা আলোকোদ্ভাসিত হয়,
Bengali.verse 74:37: তোমাদের মধ্যে যে সামনে অগ্রসর হয় অথবা পশ্চাতে থাকে।
Bengali.verse 74:38: প্রত্যেক ব্যক্তি তার কৃতকর্মের জন্য দায়ী;
Bengali.verse 74:40: তারা থাকবে জান্নাতে এবং পরস্পরে জিজ্ঞাসাবাদ করবে।
Bengali.verse 74:42: বলবেঃ তোমাদেরকে কিসে জাহান্নামে নীত করেছে?
Bengali.verse 74:43: তারা বলবেঃ আমরা নামায পড়তাম না,
Bengali.verse 74:46: এবং আমরা প্রতিফল দিবসকে অস্বীকার করতাম।
Bengali.verse 74:48: অতএব, সুপারিশকারীদের সুপারিশ তাদের কোন উপকারে আসবে না।
Bengali.verse 74:49: তাদের কি হল যে, তারা উপদেশ থেকে মুখ ফিরিয়ে নেয়?
Bengali.verse 74:52: বরং তাদের প্রত্যেকেই চায় তাদের প্রত্যেককে একটি উম্মুক্ত গ্রন্থ দেয়া হোক।
Bengali.verse 74:53: কখনও না, বরং তারা পরকালকে ভয় করে না।
Bengali.verse 74:54: কখনও না, এটা তো উপদেশ মাত্র।
Bengali.verse 74:55: অতএব, যার ইচ্ছা, সে একে স্মরণ করুক।
Bengali.verse 74:56: তারা স্মরণ করবে না, কিন্তু যদি আল্লাহ চান। তিনিই ভয়ের যোগ্য এবং ক্ষমার অধিকারী।

Bosnian.verse 74:6: I ne prigovaraj držeći da je mnogo!
Bosnian.verse 74:8: A kada se u Rog puhne –
Bosnian.verse 74:11: Meni ostavi onoga koga sam Ja izuzetkom učinio
Bosnian.verse 74:13: i sinove koji su s njim
Bosnian.verse 74:14: i čast i ugled mu pružio –
Bosnian.verse 74:16: Nikako! On, doista, prkosi ajetima Našim –
Bosnian.verse 74:19: i, proklet bio, kako je proračunao!
Bosnian.verse 74:20: i još jednom, proklet bio, kako je proračunao! –
Bosnian.verse 74:22: pa se onda smrknuo i namrštio
Bosnian.verse 74:23: i potom se okrenuo i uzoholio,
Bosnian.verse 74:24: i rekao: "Ovo nije ništa drugo do vradžbina koja se nasljeđuje,
Bosnian.verse 74:26: U Sekar ću Ja njega baciti –
Bosnian.verse 74:27: a znaš li ti šta je Sekar?
Bosnian.verse 74:31: Mi smo čuvarima vatre meleke postavili i odredili broj njihov kao iskušenje onima koji ne vjeruju, da se oni kojima je Knjiga data uvjere, i da se onima koji vjeruju vjerovanje učvrsti, i da oni kojima je Knjiga data i oni koji su vjernici ne sumnjaju, i da oni čija su srca bolesna i oni koji su nevjernici – kažu: "Šta je Allah htio ovim primjerom?" Tako Allah ostavlja u zabludi onoga koga hoće, i na Pravi put ukazuje onome kome hoće. A vojske Gospodara tvoga samo On zna. I Sekar je ljudima samo opomena.
Bosnian.verse 74:37: onome između vas koji želi učiniti dobro ili onome koji ne želi!
Bosnian.verse 74:38: Svaki čovjek je odgovoran za ono što je radio,
Bosnian.verse 74:40: oni će se u džennetskim baščama raspitivati
Bosnian.verse 74:43: "Nismo" – reći će – "bili od onih koji su molitvu obavljali
Bosnian.verse 74:44: i od onih koji su siromahe hranili,
Bosnian.verse 74:45: i u besposlice smo se sa besposlenjacima upuštali,
Bosnian.verse 74:47: sve dok nam smrt nije došla."
Bosnian.verse 74:48: Njima posredovanje posrednika neće biti od koristi.
Bosnian.verse 74:50: kao da su divlji magarci preplašeni
Bosnian.verse 74:51: koji od onih koji ih progone bježe.
Bosnian.verse 74:52: Da! Svaki čovjek bi od njih htio da mu se daju listovi rašireni.
Bosnian.verse 74:53: Nikada, jer oni se onoga svijeta ne plaše!
Bosnian.verse 74:55: i ko hoće, na umu će ga imati,
Bosnian.verse 74:56: a na umu će ga imati samo ako Allah bude htio, On je jedini dostojan da Ga se boje i On jedini prašta.

Bulgarian.verse 74:1: О, ти, който се обвиваш [в своите одежди],
Bulgarian.verse 74:6: и давайки, не се стреми да получиш вповече,
Bulgarian.verse 74:7: и в името на твоя Господ бъди търпелив!
Bulgarian.verse 74:8: И когато се протръби с Рога,
Bulgarian.verse 74:9: тогава този Ден ще е тежък Ден,
Bulgarian.verse 74:11: Остави на Мен онзи, когото сътворих самотен
Bulgarian.verse 74:15: А после той ламти да му надбавя.
Bulgarian.verse 74:16: Ала не! Пред Нашите знамения той упорства.
Bulgarian.verse 74:17: Ще го подложа на непоносимо мъчение.
Bulgarian.verse 74:19: и - проклет да е! - как прецени!
Bulgarian.verse 74:20: И отново - проклет да е! - как прецени!
Bulgarian.verse 74:23: После се отвърна и се възгордя.
Bulgarian.verse 74:24: И рече: “Това е само разпространена магия.
Bulgarian.verse 74:26: Ще го пека Аз в Преизподнята.
Bulgarian.verse 74:27: И откъде да знаеш ти какво е Преизподнята?
Bulgarian.verse 74:28: Тя нищо не оставя и не пощадява -
Bulgarian.verse 74:31: И сторихме пазители на Огъня само ангели, и сторихме броя им единствено за изпитание на неверниците, за да се убедят дарените с Писанието и да се усили вярата на повярвалите, и да не се съмняват дарените с Писанието и вярващите, и за да кажат онези, в чии
Bulgarian.verse 74:32: Ала не! Кълна се в луната
Bulgarian.verse 74:35: Този [Огън] е едно от великите изпитания
Bulgarian.verse 74:37: за всеки от вас, който пожелае да напредва или да изостава.
Bulgarian.verse 74:38: Всеки е заложник на онова, което е придобил,
Bulgarian.verse 74:43: Ще рекат: “Ние не бяхме сред отслужващите молитвата
Bulgarian.verse 74:45: и затъвахме в празнословие със затъващите,
Bulgarian.verse 74:46: и взимахме за лъжа Съдния ден,
Bulgarian.verse 74:48: Затова не ще им помогне ничие застъпничество.
Bulgarian.verse 74:49: Какво им е, защо се отдръпват от напомнянето,
Bulgarian.verse 74:52: И всеки от тях иска да му се даде разясняващата книга.
Bulgarian.verse 74:53: Ала не! Те не се страхуват от отвъдния живот.
Bulgarian.verse 74:54: Ала не! Той [- Коранът] е поучение.
Bulgarian.verse 74:55: И който пожелае, ще се поучи.
Bulgarian.verse 74:56: И не се поучават, без Аллах да пожелае. Той е Достойният да се боят от Него и е Достойният да опрости.

Chinese.verse 74:2: 你应当起来，你应当警告，
Chinese.verse 74:7: 你应当为你的主而坚忍。
Chinese.verse 74:9: 在那时，将有一个艰难的日子。
Chinese.verse 74:10: 那个日子对不信道的人们，是不容易渡过的。
Chinese.verse 74:11: 你让我独自处治我所创造的那个人吧！
Chinese.verse 74:15: 而他还冀望我再多加赏赐。
Chinese.verse 74:16: 绝不然，他确实是反对我的迹象的，
Chinese.verse 74:19: 但无论他怎样计划，他是被弃绝的。
Chinese.verse 74:20: 无论他怎样计划，他终是被弃绝的。
Chinese.verse 74:24: 而且说：这只是传习的魔术，
Chinese.verse 74:27: 你怎能知道火狱是什么？
Chinese.verse 74:28: 它不让任何物存在，不许任何物留下，
Chinese.verse 74:31: 我只将管理火狱的成天神，我只以他们的数目，考验不信道的人们，以便曾受天经的人们认清，而信道的人们更加笃信；以免曾受天经的人们和信道的人们怀疑；以便心中有病者和不信道者说：真主设这个譬喻做什么？真主这样使他所意欲的人误入迷途，使他所意欲的人遵循正路。只有你的主，能知道他的军队，这只是人类的教训。
Chinese.verse 74:37: 警告你们中欲前进者或欲后退者；
Chinese.verse 74:38: 各人将因自己的营谋而作抵押，
Chinese.verse 74:40: 他们在乐园中互相询问，
Chinese.verse 74:42: 你们为什么堕入火狱呢？
Chinese.verse 74:45: 我们与妄言的人们一道妄言，
Chinese.verse 74:47: 一直到死亡降临了我们。
Chinese.verse 74:48: 说情者的说情，将无益於他们。
Chinese.verse 74:49: 他们怎么退避这教训呢？
Chinese.verse 74:50: 他们好像一群惊慌的驴子，
Chinese.verse 74:51: 刚逃避了一只狮子一样。
Chinese.verse 74:52: 不然，他们中的每个人都希望获得一些展开的天经。
Chinese.verse 74:53: 绝不然，他们不畏惧后世！
Chinese.verse 74:54: 真的，这《古兰经》确是一个教诲！
Chinese.verse 74:56: 他们只因真主的意欲而记忆它。他是应受敬畏的，他是宜於赦宥的。

Danish.verse 74:3: En verkondig de Grootheid van uw Heer
Danish.verse 74:6: Bewijs geen gunsten om u daardoor te verrijken
Danish.verse 74:7: En wees geduldig ter wille van uw Heer
Danish.verse 74:8: Want als de bazuin wordt geblazen
Danish.verse 74:9: Die Dag zal een moeilijke dag zijn
Danish.verse 74:11: Laat Mij alleen met hem die Ik schiep
Danish.verse 74:12: Ik heb hem overvloedig bezit gegeven
Danish.verse 74:13: En zonen die bij hem zijn
Danish.verse 74:14: En ik verschafte hem elk gemak
Danish.verse 74:15: Toch verlangt hij dat Ik hem nog meer zal geven
Danish.verse 74:16: Stellig niet; want hij was vijandig tegenover Onze boodschappen
Danish.verse 74:17: Hem zal Ik een zware straf opleggen
Danish.verse 74:18: Ziet! Hij dacht na en hij besloot
Danish.verse 74:19: Vervloekt zij hij, hoe besloot hij
Danish.verse 74:20: Nogmaals, vervloekt zij hij! Hoe be sloot hij
Danish.verse 74:22: Daarna fronste hij zijn voorhoofd en keek nors
Danish.verse 74:23: Dan keerde hij zich om en toonde zich hovaardig
Danish.verse 74:24: Hij zeide: Dit is niets dan een nagebootste tovenarij
Danish.verse 74:25: Dit is slechts het woord van een mens
Danish.verse 74:26: Weldra zal Ik hem in het Vuur werpen
Danish.verse 74:27: En wat weet gij wat het Vuur der hel is
Danish.verse 74:28: Het ontziet niets, noch laat het iets (onverteerd) achter
Danish.verse 74:31: En Wij hebben niets dan engelen tot wachters van het Vuur gemaakt. En Wij hebben hun getal niet vastgesteld, dan tot beproeving der ongelovigen, opdat wie het Boek is gegeven zekerheid mogen verkrijgen en dat de gelovigen in geloof mogen toenemen en opdat de mensen van het Boek en de gelovigen niet zullen twijfelen. En dat degenen in wier hart een ziekte is en degenen die ongelovig zijn, mogen zeggen: Wat bedoelt Allah met deze gelijkenis? Zo laat Allah dwalen wie Hij wil en leidt wie Hij wil. Niemand kent de legerscharen van uw Heer dan Hij. Dit is niets dan een vermaning voor de mensheid
Danish.verse 74:33: En de nacht als zij heengaat
Danish.verse 74:34: En de dageraad wanneer zij gloort
Danish.verse 74:35: Waarlijk, het is een der grootste tijdingen
Danish.verse 74:37: Aan degene onder u, die vooruit wenst te gaan of degene die wil achterblijven
Danish.verse 74:38: Elke ziel is als een pand voor hetgeen zij doet
Danish.verse 74:39: Doch degenen aan de rechter hand
Danish.verse 74:42: Wat heeft u in de hel gebracht
Danish.verse 74:43: Zij zullen antwoorden: Wij behoorden niet tot hen die plachten te bidden
Danish.verse 74:45: En wij plachten ijdele gesprekken te voeren met hen die ijdele gesprekken voerden
Danish.verse 74:46: En wij plachten de Dag des Oordeels te loochenen
Danish.verse 74:48: De tussenkomst van bemiddelaars zal hen daarom niets baten
Danish.verse 74:49: Wat scheelt hun dat zij zich van de vermaning afwenden
Danish.verse 74:52: Neen, ieder van hen wenst dat hem opengeslagen bladzijden zullen worden getoond
Danish.verse 74:53: Voorwaar, zij vrezen het Hiernamaals niet
Danish.verse 74:54: Neen, waarlijk, dit is een vermaning
Danish.verse 74:55: Die wil, trekke er lering uit
Danish.verse 74:56: Doch zij zullen er geen lering uit trekken tenzij Allah het wil. Hij is Waardig, dat men Hem vreest, en Hij is de Heer der vergiffenis

Dutch.verse 74:3: En prijs de grootheid van jouw Heer
Dutch.verse 74:6: En geef niet om meer te ontvangen.
Dutch.verse 74:7: En wees geduldig omwille van jouw Heer.
Dutch.verse 74:8: Als dan op de bazuin geblazen wordt.
Dutch.verse 74:9: Dan is dat die Dag, een zware Dag.
Dutch.verse 74:10: (Die Dag is) voor de ongelovigen niet gemakkelijk.
Dutch.verse 74:11: Laat hem aan Mij over die Ik alleenstaand geschapen heb.
Dutch.verse 74:12: En Ik heb hem vele bezittingen ter beschikking gesteld.
Dutch.verse 74:13: En kinderen, voortdurend aan zijn zijde.
Dutch.verse 74:14: En Ik verschafte hem gemak in ruime mate.
Dutch.verse 74:15: En vervolgens verlangt hij dat Ik (voor hem) vermeerder.
Dutch.verse 74:16: Nee! Hij is opstandig tegen Onze Verzen.
Dutch.verse 74:17: Ik zal hem beladen met een zware bestraffing.
Dutch.verse 74:18: Voorwaar, hij dacht na en nam een besluit.
Dutch.verse 74:19: Verdoemd is hij daarom. Hoe vreemd was zijn besluit!
Dutch.verse 74:20: Nogmaals, verdoemd is hij! Hoe vreemd was zijn besluit!
Dutch.verse 74:22: Daarna fronste hij en keek somber.
Dutch.verse 74:23: Vervolgens keerde hij zijn rug toe en was hoogmoedig.
Dutch.verse 74:24: En hij zei: "Deze (Koran) is slechts overgedragen tovenarij.
Dutch.verse 74:25: Dit is slechts het woord van een mens."
Dutch.verse 74:26: Ik zal hem doen braden in Saqar (de Hel).
Dutch.verse 74:27: En wat doet jou weten wat Saqar is?
Dutch.verse 74:28: Zij (de Hel) laat niet achter en zij laat niet met rust.
Dutch.verse 74:29: Zij verschroeit (de huid) van de mens.
Dutch.verse 74:31: En Wij hebben geen anderen dan Engelen aangesteld als wachters van de Hel. En Wij hebben hun aantal slechts vastgesteld als een beproeving voor degenen die niet geloven en opdat degenen aan wie de Schrift gegeven is overtuigd zullen zijn. En opdat degenen die geloven zullen toenemen in geloof, en opdat degenen aan wie de Schrift is gegeven en de gelovigen niet zullen twijfelen. En opdat degenen in wier harten een ziekte is en de ongelovigen zullen zeggen: "Wat wil Allah met dit voorbeeld zeggen?" Zo laat Allah dwalen wie Hij wil, en leidt Hij wie Hij wil. En niemand kent de troepenmacht van jouw Heer dan Hij. En dit is niets anders dan een Vermaning voor de mensheid.
Dutch.verse 74:33: En de nacht wanneer hij terugkeert.
Dutch.verse 74:34: En de dageraad wanneer hij gloort.
Dutch.verse 74:35: Voorwaar, zij (de Hel) is zeker een van de grootste verschrikkingen.
Dutch.verse 74:36: (Zij is er) als een waarschuwing voor de mensheid.
Dutch.verse 74:37: Voor degenen onder hen die voort willen gaan (door goede daden te verrichten) of achter willen blijven (door slechte daden te verrichten).
Dutch.verse 74:38: Iedere ziel is een borg voor wat zij heeft verricht.
Dutch.verse 74:39: Behalve de mensen van de rechterzijde.
Dutch.verse 74:40: In Tuinen (het Paradijs) vragen zij elkaar.
Dutch.verse 74:42: (Zij zeggen:) "Wat heeft hen naar Saqar (de Hel) gevoerd?"
Dutch.verse 74:43: Zij zeiden: "Wij behoorden niet tot degenen die de shalât verrichten.
Dutch.verse 74:44: En wij voedden de armen niet.
Dutch.verse 74:45: En wij plachten ijdele gesprekken te voeren met degenen die ijdel praatten.
Dutch.verse 74:46: En wij plachten de Dag des Oordeels te loochenen.
Dutch.verse 74:47: Tot het zekere (de dood) tot ons kwam."
Dutch.verse 74:48: De voorspraak van de voorsprekers baat hen niet.
Dutch.verse 74:49: Wat is er met hen dat zij zich van de Vermaning afwenden?
Dutch.verse 74:52: Toch wil een ieder van hen, dat hun opengespreidde bladen (van een Openbaring) worden gegeven.
Dutch.verse 74:53: Nee! Zij vrezen zelfs het Hiernamaals niet.
Dutch.verse 74:54: Nee, voorwaar, hij (de Koran) is een Vermaning.
Dutch.verse 74:55: Wie wil trekt er lering uit.
Dutch.verse 74:56: En zij trekken er geen lering uit, behalve als Allah het wil. Hij is het Die vrees toekomt en Hij is het Die het toekomt om te vergeven.

English.verse 74:1: O you who covers himself [with a garment],
English.verse 74:6: And do not confer favor to acquire more
English.verse 74:7: But for your Lord be patient.
English.verse 74:8: And when the trumpet is blown,
English.verse 74:9: That Day will be a difficult day
English.verse 74:11: Leave Me with the one I created alone
English.verse 74:12: And to whom I granted extensive wealth
English.verse 74:14: And spread [everything] before him, easing [his life].
English.verse 74:15: Then he desires that I should add more.
English.verse 74:16: No! Indeed, he has been toward Our verses obstinate.
English.verse 74:17: I will cover him with arduous torment.
English.verse 74:19: So may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.
English.verse 74:20: Then may he be destroyed [for] how he deliberated.
English.verse 74:23: Then he turned back and was arrogant
English.verse 74:24: And said, "This is not but magic imitated [from others].
English.verse 74:25: This is not but the word of a human being."
English.verse 74:26: I will drive him into Saqar.
English.verse 74:27: And what can make you know what is Saqar?
English.verse 74:28: It lets nothing remain and leaves nothing [unburned],
English.verse 74:31: And We have not made the keepers of the Fire except angels. And We have not made their number except as a trial for those who disbelieve - that those who were given the Scripture will be convinced and those who have believed will increase in faith and those who were given the Scripture and the believers will not doubt and that those in whose hearts is hypocrisy and the disbelievers will say, "What does Allah intend by this as an example?" Thus does Allah leave astray whom He wills and guides whom He wills. And none knows the soldiers of your Lord except Him. And mention of the Fire is not but a reminder to humanity.
English.verse 74:33: And [by] the night when it departs
English.verse 74:34: And [by] the morning when it brightens,
English.verse 74:35: Indeed, the Fire is of the greatest [afflictions]
English.verse 74:37: To whoever wills among you to proceed or stay behind.
English.verse 74:38: Every soul, for what it has earned, will be retained
English.verse 74:39: Except the companions of the right,
English.verse 74:40: [Who will be] in gardens, questioning each other
English.verse 74:42: [And asking them], "What put you into Saqar?"
English.verse 74:43: They will say, "We were not of those who prayed,
English.verse 74:44: Nor did we used to feed the poor.
English.verse 74:45: And we used to enter into vain discourse with those who engaged [in it],
English.verse 74:46: And we used to deny the Day of Recompense
English.verse 74:47: Until there came to us the certainty."
English.verse 74:48: So there will not benefit them the intercession of [any] intercessors.
English.verse 74:49: Then what is [the matter] with them that they are, from the reminder, turning away
English.verse 74:50: As if they were alarmed donkeys
English.verse 74:52: Rather, every person among them desires that he would be given scriptures spread about.
English.verse 74:53: No! But they do not fear the Hereafter.
English.verse 74:54: No! Indeed, the Qur'an is a reminder
English.verse 74:55: Then whoever wills will remember it.
English.verse 74:56: And they will not remember except that Allah wills. He is worthy of fear and adequate for [granting] forgiveness.

Filipino.verse 74:2: Magbangon ka at ipahayag mo ang iyong babala
Filipino.verse 74:3: Ang iyong Panginoon (Allah) ang iyong ipinagbubunyi sa kapurihan
Filipino.verse 74:4: Ang iyong kasuotan ay gawin mong dalisay
Filipino.verse 74:5: Ang lahat ng kabuktutan ay iyong layuan (Ar-Rujz, mga imahen o diyus-diyosan)
Filipino.verse 74:6: At huwag maghangad ng ganti kung ikaw ay nagbigay, na dagdag sa makamundong pakinabang (o huwag mong ipalagay na ang gawang kabutihan sa pagsunod kay Allah ay isang biyaya sa Kanya)
Filipino.verse 74:7: At maging matimtiman (sa pagtitimpi) sa kapakanan ng iyong Panginoon (alalaong baga, iyong ganapin ang iyong tungkulin sa Kanya)
Filipino.verse 74:8: At kung hihipan na ang Tambuli (sa kanyang pangalawang pag-ihip)
Filipino.verse 74:9: Katotohanan! Ang Araw na yaon ay Araw ng Hapis
Filipino.verse 74:10: Na kasakit-sakit sa mga walang pananalig
Filipino.verse 74:11: Hayaang Ako lamang (ang makitungo) sa mga (nilalang) na Aking nilikha (na hubad at walang pinagkukunan ng anuman)
Filipino.verse 74:12: Na Aking ginawaran ng lahat ng bagay ng kasaganaan
Filipino.verse 74:13: At mga anak na nasa kanyang tabi
Filipino.verse 74:14: Aking iginawad ang buhay na maayos at maginhawa sa kanya
Filipino.verse 74:15: Datapuwa’t siya ay sakim, - na Ako ay marapat pang magbigay ng higit
Filipino.verse 74:16: Katotohanan, (siya ay pagkakaitan)! Sapagkat siya ay hindi nagbigay ng halaga sa Aming Kapahayagan at Tagubilin (at nanatiling matigas ang ulo)
Filipino.verse 74:17: Hindi magtatagal, siya ay Aming dadalawin ng gabundok na kapahamakan (ang umakyat sa madulas na bundok ng As-Sa’ud sa Impiyerno)
Filipino.verse 74:18: Katotohanang siya ay nag-isip at nagbalak
Filipino.verse 74:19: Kaya’t kasawian sa kanya ( sa kaparusahan)! Paano siya nagbalak
Filipino.verse 74:20: At minsan pa, kasawian sa kanya (sa kaparusahan), paano siya nagbalak
Filipino.verse 74:21: At siya ay nagmuni-muni (nagmalas sa kanyang kapaligiran)
Filipino.verse 74:22: At siya ay kumunot at siya ay nayamot
Filipino.verse 74:23: At siya ay tumalikod at naging palalo
Filipino.verse 74:24: At siya ay nagturing : “Ito ay wala ng iba kundi salamangka, mula pa noong unang panahon
Filipino.verse 74:25: Ito ay wala ng iba maliban sa salita lamang ng isang tao!”
Filipino.verse 74:26: Hindi magtatagal , Aking ihahagis siya sa Apoy ng Impiyerno
Filipino.verse 74:27: Ah! Ano nga ba ang makakapagbigay paliwanag sa iyo kung ano ang Apoy ng Impiyerno
Filipino.verse 74:28: Ito ay hindi nagpapaubaya (sa sinumang makasalanan), gayundin, ito ay hindi nag-iiwan (ng anumang bagay na hindi sunog)
Filipino.verse 74:29: Na nagpapaitim at nagpapabago sa kulay ng tao (dahilan sa pagkasunog)
Filipino.verse 74:30: Sa itaas nito ay may labingsiyam (na mga anghel bilang tagapagbantay at tagapanatili ng Impiyerno)
Filipino.verse 74:31: At Kami ang nagtalaga ng mga anghel bilang tagapagbantay ng Apoy, at Aming itinakda lamang ang kanilang dami (19) bilang isang pagsubok sa mga hindi nananampalataya, - upang ang mga tao ng Angkan ng Kasulatan (mga Hudyo at Kristiyano) ay dumatal sa katiyakan (na ang Qur’an ay katotohanan na umaayon sa kanilang mga Aklat, alalaong baga, ang kanilang bilang [19] ay nasusulat sa Torah [mga Batas] at Ebanghelyo), at upang ang mga sumasampalataya ay lalong mag-ibayo sa Pananalig 922 (sapagkat ang Qur’an ang katotohanan), - at upang ang mga tao ng Angkan ng Kasulatan at ang mga sumasampalataya ay hindi mag-alinlangan dito, at ang mga tao na ang laman ng kanilang puso ay isang sakit (ng pagkukunwari) at ang mga hindi nananampalataya ay makapagsabi: “Ano baga ang ibig ipakahulugan ni Allah sa pamamagitan nito? Kaya’t si Allah ang umaakay na mapaligaw ang sinumang Kanyang maibigan at namamatnubay sa sinumang Kanyang maibigan. At walang sinuman ang nakakatalos ng mga kapangyarihan ng iyong Panginoon maliban sa Kanya. At ito (Impiyerno) ay wala ng iba pa maliban na isang Paala-ala (babala at tagubilin) sa sangkatauhan
Filipino.verse 74:32: Hindi, at katotohanang sa pamamagitan ng Buwan
Filipino.verse 74:33: At sa pamamagitan ng gabi kung ito ay humimlay
Filipino.verse 74:34: At sa pamamagitan ng bukang liwayway kung ito ay namamanaag
Filipino.verse 74:35: Katotohanang ito ay isa lamang sa mga Matitibay na Palatandaan (Impiyerno, o ang kanilang pagtatatwa kay Propeta Muhammad, o ang Araw ng Muling Pagkabuhay)
Filipino.verse 74:37: Sa sinuman sa inyo na nagpasyang tumahak nang pasulong (sa pamamagitan ng paggawa ng kabutihan), o magpaiwan sa likuran (sa pamamagitan ng paggawa ng kasamaan)
Filipino.verse 74:38: Ang bawat tao (kaluluwa) ay isang sanla sa kanyang mga gawa
Filipino.verse 74:39: Maliban sa kanila na nanatili sa Kanan (alalaong baga, ang mga tunay na nananampalataya sa Kaisahan ni Allah at sa Islam)
Filipino.verse 74:40: Sila ay mapapasa- Halamanan ng Kaligayahan, at nagtatanungan sa isa’t isa
Filipino.verse 74:41: Ng tungkol sa Al-Mujrimun (mga makasalanan, mapagsamba sa diyus-diyosan, walang pananalig, kriminal, atbp.), [at sila ay mangungusap sa kanila]
Filipino.verse 74:42: “Ano ang naghatid sa inyo tungo sa Apoy ng Impiyerno?”
Filipino.verse 74:43: Sila ay magsasabi: “Kami ay kabilang sa mga hindi nag-aalay ng palagiang panalangin
Filipino.verse 74:44: At kami rin ay hindi kabilang sa nagbibigay ng pagkain sa naghihikahos
Filipino.verse 74:45: Bagkus kami ay nangag-uusap ng kabulaanan (na kinamumuhiang lahat ni Allah) sa mga walang saysay na pangungusap
Filipino.verse 74:46: At kami ay lagi nang nagpapasinungaling sa Araw ng Paghuhukom
Filipino.verse 74:47: Hanggang sa sumapit sa amin ang tiyak na Takdang Oras (kamatayan).”
Filipino.verse 74:48: At ang pamamagitan ng mga namamagitan ay walang kapakinabangan sa kanila
Filipino.verse 74:49: Kung gayon, ano ang nagpapagulo sa kanila (alalaong baga,angmgahindisumasampalataya),atsilaaytumatalikod (sa pagtanggap) ng Paala-ala
Filipino.verse 74:50: Na wari bang sila ay mga nasisindaknaasno
Filipino.verse 74:52: Katotohanan! Ang bawat isa sa kanila ay nagnanais na sila ay bigyan ng nakaladlad na dahon ng kapahayagan (mula kay Allah, na may nakasulat na ang Islam ang tamang Pananampalataya, at si Muhammad ay dumatal na may dalang katotohanan mula kay Allah, ang Panginoon ng kalangitan at kalupaan, atbp)
Filipino.verse 74:53: Hindi, sa anumang kaparaanan! Sapagkat sila ay hindi nangangamba sa (kaparusahan ni Allah) sa Kabilang Buhay
Filipino.verse 74:54: Hindi! Katotohanang ito (ang Qur’an) ay isang Paala-ala
Filipino.verse 74:55: Kaya’t sinuman ang magnais, (hayaan siyang bumasa nito), at tumanggap ng tagubilin (mula rito)
Filipino.verse 74:56: Datapuwa’t sila ay hindi tatanggap ng tagubilin malibang pahintulutan ni Allah. Siya ang Panginoon ng Kabutihan at Panginoon ng Pagpapatawad (alalaong baga, sinuman ang umiwas sa masamang gawa na Kanyang ipinagbabawal at gumawa ng mabuti na Kanyang ipinag-uutos, Siya [kung gayon] ay magpapatawad sa kanila at sila ay hindi Niya parurusahan

French.verse 74:1: O, toi (Muhammad)! Le revêtu d'un manteau!
French.verse 74:3: Et de ton Seigneur, célèbre la grandeur.
French.verse 74:6: Et ne donne pas dans le but de recevoir davantage.
French.verse 74:9: alors, ce jour-là sera un jour difficile,
French.verse 74:11: Laisse-Moi avec celui que J'ai créé seul,
French.verse 74:12: et à qui J'ai donné des biens étendus,
French.verse 74:13: et des enfants qui lui tiennent toujours compagnie,
French.verse 74:14: pour qui aussi J'ai aplani toutes difficultés
French.verse 74:15: Cependant, il convoite [de Moi] que Je lui donne davantage.
French.verse 74:16: Pas du tout! Car il reniait nos versets (le Coran) avec entêtement.
French.verse 74:17: Je vais le contraindre à gravir une pente.
French.verse 74:18: Il a réfléchi. Et il a décidé.
French.verse 74:19: Qu'il périsse! Comme il a décidé!
French.verse 74:20: Encore une fois, qu'il périsse; comme il a décidé!
French.verse 74:22: Et il s'est renfrogné et a durci son visage.
French.verse 74:23: Ensuite il a tourné le dos et s'est enflé d'orgueil
French.verse 74:24: Puis il a dit: «Ceci (le Coran) n'est que magie apprise
French.verse 74:25: ce n'est là que la parole d'un humain».
French.verse 74:26: Je vais le brûler dans le Feu intense (Saqar).
French.verse 74:27: Et qui te dira ce qu'est Saqar?
French.verse 74:28: Il ne laisse rien et n'épargne rien;
French.verse 74:29: Il brûle la peau et la noircit.
French.verse 74:30: Ils sont dix neuf à y veiller.
French.verse 74:31: Nous n'avons assigné comme gardiens du Feu que des Anges. Cependant, Nous n'en avons fixé le nombre que pour éprouver les mécréants, et aussi afin que ceux à qui le Livre a été apporté soient convaincus, et que croisse la foi de ceux qui croient, et que ceux à qui le Livre a été apporté et les croyants n'aient point de doute; et pour que ceux qui ont au cœur quelque maladie ainsi que les mécréants disent: «Qu'a donc voulu Allah par cette parabole?» C'est ainsi qu'Allah égare qui Il veut et guide qui Il veut. Nul ne connaît les armées de ton Seigneur, à part Lui. Et ce n'est là qu'un rappel pour les humains.
French.verse 74:33: Et par la nuit quand elle se retire!
French.verse 74:34: Et par l'aurore quand elle se découvre!
French.verse 74:37: Pour qui d'entre vous, veut avancer ou reculer.
French.verse 74:38: Toute âme est l'otage de ce qu'elle a acquis.
French.verse 74:39: Sauf les gens de la droite (les élus):
French.verse 74:42: «Qu'est-ce qui vous a acheminés à Saqar?»
French.verse 74:43: Ils diront: «Nous n'étions pas de ceux qui faisaient la Salât,
French.verse 74:44: et nous ne nourrissions pas le pauvre,
French.verse 74:45: et nous nous associions à ceux qui tenaient des conversations futiles,
French.verse 74:46: et nous traitions de mensonge le jour de la Rétribution,
French.verse 74:47: jusqu'à ce que nous vînt la vérité évidente [la mort]».
French.verse 74:48: Ne leur profitera point donc, l'intercession des intercesseurs.
French.verse 74:49: Qu'ont-ils à se détourner du Rappel?
French.verse 74:50: Ils sont comme des onagres épouvantés,
French.verse 74:52: Chacun d'eux voudrait plutôt qu'on lui apporte des feuilles tout étalées.
French.verse 74:53: Ah! Non! C'est plutôt qu'ils ne craignent pas l'au-delà.
French.verse 74:54: Ah! Non! Ceci est vraiment un Rappel.
French.verse 74:55: Quiconque veut, qu'il se le rappelle.
French.verse 74:56: Mais ils ne se rappelleront que si Allah veut. C'est Lui qui est Le plus digne d'être craint; et c'est Lui qui détient le pardon.

Fulah.verse 74:6: Wata a okkir fii heɓugol ko ɓuri ɗum
Fulah.verse 74:9: haray nden ñalnde woni, ñalaande sattunde
Fulah.verse 74:10: e hoore heeferɓe ɓen, nde wanaa newiinde
Fulah.verse 74:11: Accidam e mo Mi tagi on kañun tun
Fulah.verse 74:15: refti himo tamƴinoo nde mi ɓeydata
Fulah.verse 74:16: Ɗum waɗataa ! Tawde o laatino sanndalɗiiɗo e Aayeeje Amen ɗen
Fulah.verse 74:17: Aray Mi fawa mo lette sattuɗe
Fulah.verse 74:18: Kanko on, o miijiti o eɓɓindii
Fulah.verse 74:19: O huɗaama hono no o hoddiri
Fulah.verse 74:20: Refti o huɗa hono o hoddiri
Fulah.verse 74:24: ɓe wi`a: "Ɗum wonaali, si wanaa mbilewu ɓanngu ngu
Fulah.verse 74:25: Mbo wonah si wonah konngol aade
Fulah.verse 74:26: Ma Mi naatnu mbo yiite saqara
Fulah.verse 74:27: Hol ko anndin ma ko woni Saqara
Fulah.verse 74:30: Ina e dow mannge sappa e jeenay
Fulah.verse 74:31: Men waɗaali aynooɓe yimɓe Yiite ngen, si wanaa Malaa’ika. Men waɗiraali limoore maɓɓe si wanaa jarraborgol yedduɓe ɓen, e fii yo henan okkaaɓe Defte ɓen, e fii no gomɗimɓe ɓen ɓeydora gomɗinal, e fii wata okkaaɓe Defte ɓen e gomɗimɓe ɓen sikkito; e fii yo ɓen ɓe ñawu woni e ɓerɗe mun e heeferɓe ɓen wi’u: "Hara ko honɗum Allah faandorii e ngal misal?" Ko wano non Allah majjinirta mo O muuyani, himo fewna kadi mo O muuyani. Hay gooto anndaa yeru koneeli Joomi maa ɗin, si wanaa Kanko. Ngen [Yiite] wonaali, si wanaa waaju wonannde neɗɗanke
Fulah.verse 74:32: Kono yo henane! Mi woondirii lewru ndun
Fulah.verse 74:33: O woondiri jemma si mbo runtii ma
Fulah.verse 74:37: Wonannde on yiɗuɗo e mo’on, nde o yaccotoo maa nennoo
Fulah.verse 74:38: Wonkii kala ko faggii kon nanngirte
Fulah.verse 74:40: hiɓe e nder gese, hiɓe lamndondira
Fulah.verse 74:43: Ɓen wi`a: "Men jeyanooka e juulooɓe ɓen
Fulah.verse 74:44: men jeyanooka kadi e ñamminooɓe miskimɓe ɓen
Fulah.verse 74:45: Hari men jumpidayno kadi e jumpooɓe ɓen
Fulah.verse 74:46: Hari kadi men fennayno fii ñalaande njoɓdi nden
Fulah.verse 74:49: Hol ko waɗi ɓe sirkuɓe na ɗuurno Quraana
Fulah.verse 74:50: Hoɓe mba*i e bamɗi laawatooɗi na ndoga
Fulah.verse 74:52: Gooto e mum en fof na faaala totteede ɗeri caraaɗi
Fulah.verse 74:55: Ko kala faalaaɗo waactaroo mbo o waaccaroo mbo
Fulah.verse 74:56: ɓe mbaactaaka si wonah Alla na haaja, ko Kanko woni kaanduɗo e huleede ko Kanko woni kaanduɗo e yaafaade

German.verse 74:3: und deinen Herrn, Den preise als den Größten,
German.verse 74:5: und die (Unreinheit des) Götzen(dienstes), die meide,
German.verse 74:6: und halte nicht (deinen Verdienst) vor, und halte ihn nicht für zu groß,
German.verse 74:7: und ertrage standhaft (alles) für deinen Herrn.
German.verse 74:8: Wenn dann ins Horn gestoßen wird,
German.verse 74:9: so wird jener Tag ein schwerer Tag sein
German.verse 74:11: Lasse Mich (allein) mit wem Ich allein erschaffen habe,
German.verse 74:12: und dem Ich ausgedehnten Besitz gegeben habe
German.verse 74:14: und dem Ich alles schön zurechtgemacht habe;
German.verse 74:15: doch begehrt er hierauf, daß Ich (ihm) noch mehr gebe.
German.verse 74:16: Keineswegs! Er ist gegen Unsere Zeichen wiederholt widerspenstig gewesen.
German.verse 74:17: Ich werde ihn mit Beschwerlichem bedrücken.
German.verse 74:18: Er hat ja nachgedacht und abgewogen.
German.verse 74:19: Tod ihm, wie er abgewogen hat!
German.verse 74:20: Abermals: Tod ihm, wie er abgewogen hat!
German.verse 74:22: hierauf hat er düster geblickt und ein finsteres Gesicht gemacht,
German.verse 74:23: hierauf hat er den Rücken gekehrt und ist hochmütig geblieben.
German.verse 74:24: Er sagt: "Das ist nur Zauberei, die überliefert wird.
German.verse 74:25: Das sind nur die Worte von Menschenwesen."
German.verse 74:26: Ich werde ihn der Saqar aussetzen.
German.verse 74:27: Und was läßt dich wissen, was Saqar ist?
German.verse 74:28: Sie läßt nichts übrig und läßt nichts bestehen.
German.verse 74:31: Wir haben als Wächter des (Höllen)feuers nur Engel eingesetzt, und Wir haben ihre Zahl nur zu einer Versuchung gemacht für diejenigen, die ungläubig sind, damit diejenigen Überzeugung gewinnen, denen die Schrift gegeben wurde, und damit diejenigen, die glauben, an Glauben zunehmen, und damit diejenigen, denen die Schrift gegeben wurde, und (auch) die Gläubigen nicht zweifeln und damit diejenigen, in deren Herzen Krankheit ist, und (auch) die Ungläubigen sagen: "Was will denn Allah damit als Gleichnis?" So läßt Allah in die Irre gehen, wen Er will, und leitet recht, wen Er will. Aber niemand weiß über die Heerscharen deines Herrn Bescheid außer Ihm. Und es ist nur eine Ermahnung für die Menschenwesen.
German.verse 74:33: und (bei) der Nacht, wenn sie den Rücken kehrt,
German.verse 74:34: und (bei) dem Morgen, wenn er erstrahlt,
German.verse 74:35: sie ist wahrlich eine der größten (Heimsuchungen)
German.verse 74:37: für jemanden von euch, der vorankommen oder zurückbleiben will.
German.verse 74:38: Jede Seele haftet für das, was sie erworben hat,
German.verse 74:39: außerdem die Gefährten von der rechten Seite;
German.verse 74:40: sie werden sich in Gärten befinden, und sie werden einander fragen
German.verse 74:43: Sie werden sagen: "Wir gehörten nicht zu denjenigen, die beteten,
German.verse 74:44: und wir pflegten nicht den Armen zu speisen,
German.verse 74:45: und wir pflegten auf schweifende Reden mit denjenigen einzugehen, die solche führten,
German.verse 74:46: und wir erklärten stets den Tag des Gerichts für Lüge
German.verse 74:47: bis die Gewißheit zu uns kam."
German.verse 74:48: Nun nützt ihnen die Fürsprache derjenigen nicht, die Fürsprache einlegen (können).
German.verse 74:49: Was ist denn mit ihnen, daß sie sich von der Ermahnung abwenden,
German.verse 74:52: Aber nein! Jedermann von ihnen will, daß ihm aufgeschlagene Blätter zukommen.
German.verse 74:53: Keineswegs! Vielmehr fürchten sie nicht das Jenseits.
German.verse 74:54: Keineswegs! Er ist ja eine Erinnerung.
German.verse 74:56: Sie werden aber (seiner) nicht gedenken, außer daß Allah es will. Ihm gebührt die Gottesfurcht und Ihm gebührt die Vergebung.

Hausa.verse 74:1: Yã wanda ya lulluɓa da mayãfi.
Hausa.verse 74:2: Ka tãshi dõmin ka yi gargaɗi
Hausa.verse 74:3: Kuma Ubangijinka, sai ka girmama Shi,
Hausa.verse 74:4: Kuma tutãfinka, sai ka tsarkake su,
Hausa.verse 74:5: Kuma gumãka, sai ka ƙaurace musu.
Hausa.verse 74:6: Kada ka yi kyauta kana nẽman ƙãri
Hausa.verse 74:7: Kuma sabõda Ubangijinka? Sai ka yi haƙure
Hausa.verse 74:8: To, idan aka yi bũsa a cikin ƙaho.
Hausa.verse 74:9: To, wannan, a rãnar nan, yini ne mai wuya
Hausa.verse 74:10: A kan kãfirai, bã mai sauƙi ba ne.
Hausa.verse 74:11: Ka bar Ni da wanda Na halitta, yana shi kaɗai,
Hausa.verse 74:12: Kuma Na sanya masa dũkiya shimfiɗaɗɗiya
Hausa.verse 74:14: Kuma Na shimfiɗa? masa kõme shimfiɗãwa.
Hausa.verse 74:15: Sa'an nan, yanã kwaɗayin in yi masa ƙãri!
Hausa.verse 74:16: Faufau! Lalle ne, shĩ yã kasance, ga ãyõyinMu, mai tsaurin kai.
Hausa.verse 74:17: Zã Ni kallafa masa wahala mai hauhawa.
Hausa.verse 74:18: Lalle ne, Shi, yã yi tunãni, kuma yã ƙaddara (abin da zai faɗã game da Alƙur'ãni)
Hausa.verse 74:19: Sabõda haka, aka la'ane shi, kamar yadda ya ƙaddara.
Hausa.verse 74:20: Sa'an nan, aka la'ane shi kamar yadda ya ƙaddara.
Hausa.verse 74:22: Sa'an nan, ya gintse huska? kuma ya yi murtuk.
Hausa.verse 74:23: Sa'an nan, ya jũya bãya, kuma ya bunƙãsa,
Hausa.verse 74:24: Sai ya ce: "Wannan abu dai bã kõme ba ne fãce wani sihiri, wanda aka ruwaito."
Hausa.verse 74:26: Zã Ni ƙõna shi da Saƙar.
Hausa.verse 74:27: Kuma mẽ ya sanar da kai abin da akẽ cẽwa Saƙar!
Hausa.verse 74:28: Bã ta ragẽwa, kuma bã ta bari.
Hausa.verse 74:30: A kanta akwai (matsara) gõma shã tara.
Hausa.verse 74:31: Kuma ba Mu sanya ma'abũta wutã (wãto matsaranta) ba, fãce malã'iku, kuma ba Mu sanya adadinsu (gõma sha tara) ba, fãce dõmin fitina ga waɗanda suka kãfirta domin waɗanda aka bai wa littãfi su sãmi yaƙĩni kuma waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni su ƙãra ĩmãni, kuma waɗanda aka bai wa littãfi da mũminai bã zã su yi shakka ba, kuma domin wa ɗanda a cikin zukatansu akwai wata cuta da kãfirai su ce: "Mẽ Allah Yake nufi da wannan, ya kasance misãli?" Haka dai Allah ke ɓatar da wanda Ya so, kuma Ya shiryar da wanda ya so. Kuma bãbu wanda ya san mayãƙan Ubangijinka fãce Shi, kuma ita (wutar) ba ta kasance ba fãce wata tunãtarwa ce ga mutum.
Hausa.verse 74:33: Da dare a lõkacin da ya jũyar da baya.
Hausa.verse 74:37: Ga wanda ya so, daga cikinku, ya gabãta ko ya jinkirta.
Hausa.verse 74:38: Kõwane rai ga abin da ya aikata jingina ce.
Hausa.verse 74:40: A cikin Aljanna suna tambayar jũna.
Hausa.verse 74:42: (Su ce musu) "Me ya shigar da ku a cikin Saƙar?"
Hausa.verse 74:43: Suka ce: "Ba mu kasance munã a cikin mãsu salla ba."
Hausa.verse 74:44: "Kuma ba mu kasance muna ciyar da matalautã ba."
Hausa.verse 74:45: "Kuma mun kasance muna kũtsãwa tãre da mãsu kũtsãwa."
Hausa.verse 74:48: Sabõda haka cẽton mãsu cẽto bã zai amfãne su ba.
Hausa.verse 74:49: Haba! Me ya same su, suka zama mãsu bijirewa daga wa'azin gaskiya.
Hausa.verse 74:50: Kamar dai sũ, jãkuna firgitattu ne.
Hausa.verse 74:52: A'aha! Kõwãne mutum daga cikinsu yanã son a zo masa da takardu (da sũnansa) ana wãtsãwa
Hausa.verse 74:53: A'aha! Kai dai, bã su jin tsõron Lãhira.
Hausa.verse 74:54: A'aha! Lalle ne, shi (Alƙur'ãni) tunãtarwa ce.
Hausa.verse 74:55: Dõmin wanda ya so, ya tuna.
Hausa.verse 74:56: Kuma bã zã su tuna ba fãce idan Allah Ya so, Shi ne Ya cancanta a bi Shi da taƙawa kuma Ya cancanta ga Ya yi gãfara.

Hindi.verse 74:3: और अपने परवरदिगार की बड़ाई करो
Hindi.verse 74:6: और इसी तरह एहसान न करो कि ज्यादा के ख़ास्तगार बनो
Hindi.verse 74:7: और अपने परवरदिगार के लिए सब्र करो
Hindi.verse 74:9: तो वह दिन काफ़िरों पर सख्त दिन होगा
Hindi.verse 74:11: (ऐ रसूल) मुझे और उस शख़्श को छोड़ दो जिसे मैने अकेला पैदा किया
Hindi.verse 74:12: और उसे बहुत सा माल दिया
Hindi.verse 74:13: और नज़र के सामने रहने वाले बेटे (दिए)
Hindi.verse 74:14: और उसे हर तरह के सामान से वुसअत दी
Hindi.verse 74:15: फिर उस पर भी वह तमाअ रखता है कि मैं और बढ़ाऊँ
Hindi.verse 74:16: ये हरगिज़ न होगा ये तो मेरी आयतों का दुश्मन था
Hindi.verse 74:17: तो मैं अनक़रीब उस सख्त अज़ाब में मुब्तिला करूँगा
Hindi.verse 74:18: उसने फिक्र की और ये तजवीज़ की
Hindi.verse 74:22: फिर त्योरी चढ़ाई और मुँह बना लिया
Hindi.verse 74:23: फिर पीठ फेर कर चला गया और अकड़ बैठा
Hindi.verse 74:24: फिर कहने लगा ये बस जादू है जो (अगलों से) चला आता है
Hindi.verse 74:25: ये तो बस आदमी का कलाम है
Hindi.verse 74:26: (ख़ुदा का नहीं) मैं उसे अनक़रीब जहन्नुम में झोंक दूँगा
Hindi.verse 74:27: और तुम क्या जानों कि जहन्नुम क्या है
Hindi.verse 74:28: वह न बाक़ी रखेगी न छोड़ देगी
Hindi.verse 74:29: और बदन को जला कर सियाह कर देगी
Hindi.verse 74:31: और हमने जहन्नुम का निगेहबान तो बस फरिश्तों को बनाया है और उनका ये शुमार भी काफिरों की आज़माइश के लिए मुक़र्रर किया ताकि अहले किताब (फौरन) यक़ीन कर लें और मोमिनो का ईमान और ज्यादा हो और अहले किताब और मोमिनीन (किसी तरह) शक़ न करें और जिन लोगों के दिल में (निफ़ाक का) मर्ज़ है (वह) और काफिर लोग कह बैठे कि इस मसल (के बयान करने) से ख़ुदा का क्या मतलब है यूँ ख़ुदा जिसे चाहता है गुमराही में छोड़ देता है और जिसे चाहता है हिदायत करता है और तुम्हारे परवरदिगार के लशकरों को उसके सिवा कोई नहीं जानता और ये तो आदमियों के लिए बस नसीहत है
Hindi.verse 74:33: और रात की जब जाने लगे
Hindi.verse 74:34: और सुबह की जब रौशन हो जाए
Hindi.verse 74:35: कि वह (जहन्नुम) भी एक बहुत बड़ी (आफ़त) है
Hindi.verse 74:37: (सबके लिए नहीें बल्कि) तुममें से वह जो शख़्श (नेकी की तरफ़) आगे बढ़ना
Hindi.verse 74:38: और (बुराई से) पीछे हटना चाहे हर शख़्श अपने आमाल के बदले गिर्द है
Hindi.verse 74:39: मगर दाहिने हाथ (में नामए अमल लेने) वाले
Hindi.verse 74:40: (बेहिश्त के) बाग़ों में गुनेहगारों से बाहम पूछ रहे होंगे
Hindi.verse 74:41: कि आख़िर तुम्हें दोज़ख़ में कौन सी चीज़ (घसीट) लायी
Hindi.verse 74:43: कि हम न तो नमाज़ पढ़ा करते थे
Hindi.verse 74:44: और न मोहताजों को खाना खिलाते थे
Hindi.verse 74:45: और अहले बातिल के साथ हम भी बड़े काम में घुस पड़ते थे
Hindi.verse 74:46: और रोज़ जज़ा को झुठलाया करते थे (और यूँ ही रहे)
Hindi.verse 74:47: यहाँ तक कि हमें मौत आ गयी
Hindi.verse 74:48: तो (उस वक्त) उन्हें सिफ़ारिश करने वालों की सिफ़ारिश कुछ काम न आएगी
Hindi.verse 74:49: और उन्हें क्या हो गया है कि नसीहत से मुँह मोड़े हुए हैं
Hindi.verse 74:51: कि येर से (दुम दबा कर) भागते हैं
Hindi.verse 74:52: असल ये है कि उनमें से हर शख़्श इसका मुतमइनी है कि उसे खुली हुई (आसमानी) किताबें अता की जाएँ
Hindi.verse 74:53: ये तो हरगिज़ न होगा बल्कि ये तो आख़ेरत ही से नहीं डरते
Hindi.verse 74:54: हाँ हाँ बेशक ये (क़ुरान सरा सर) नसीहत है
Hindi.verse 74:55: तो जो चाहे उसे याद रखे
Hindi.verse 74:56: और ख़ुदा की मशीयत के बग़ैर ये लोग याद रखने वाले नहीं वही (बन्दों के) डराने के क़ाबिल और बख्यिश का मालिक है

Indonesian.verse 74:6: dan janganlah kamu memberi (dengan maksud) memperoleh (balasan) yang lebih banyak.
Indonesian.verse 74:9: maka waktu itu adalah waktu (datangnya) hari yang sulit,
Indonesian.verse 74:10: bagi orang-orang kafir lagi tidak mudah.
Indonesian.verse 74:11: Biarkanlah Aku bertindak terhadap orang yang Aku telah menciptakannya sendirian.
Indonesian.verse 74:12: Dan Aku jadikan baginya harta benda yang banyak,
Indonesian.verse 74:13: dan anak-anak yang selalu bersama dia,
Indonesian.verse 74:14: dan Ku-lapangkan baginya (rezeki dan kekuasaan) dengan selapang-lapangnya,
Indonesian.verse 74:15: kemudian dia ingin sekali supaya Aku menambahnya.
Indonesian.verse 74:16: Sekali-kali tidak (akan Aku tambah), karena sesungguhnya dia menentang ayat-ayat Kami (Al Quran).
Indonesian.verse 74:17: Aku akan membebaninya mendaki pendakian yang memayahkan.
Indonesian.verse 74:18: Sesungguhnya dia telah memikirkan dan menetapkan (apa yang ditetapkannya),
Indonesian.verse 74:19: maka celakalah dia! Bagaimana dia menetapkan?,
Indonesian.verse 74:20: kemudian celakalah dia! Bagaimanakah dia menetapkan?,
Indonesian.verse 74:22: sesudah itu dia bermasam muka dan merengut,
Indonesian.verse 74:23: kemudian dia berpaling (dari kebenaran) dan menyombongkan diri,
Indonesian.verse 74:24: lalu dia berkata: "(Al Quran) ini tidak lain hanyalah sihir yang dipelajari (dari orang-orang dahulu),
Indonesian.verse 74:25: ini tidak lain hanyalah perkataan manusia".
Indonesian.verse 74:26: Aku akan memasukkannya ke dalam (neraka) Saqar.
Indonesian.verse 74:28: Saqar itu tidak meninggalkan dan tidak membiarkan.
Indonesian.verse 74:30: Dan di atasnya ada sembilan belas (malaikat penjaga).
Indonesian.verse 74:31: Dan tiada Kami jadikan penjaga neraka itu melainkan dari malaikat: dan tidaklah Kami menjadikan bilangan mereka itu melainkan untuk jadi cobaan bagi orang-orang kafir, supaya orang-orang yang diberi Al-Kitab menjadi yakin dan supaya orang yang beriman bertambah imannya dan supaya orang-orang yang diberi Al Kitab dan orng-orang mukmin itu tidak ragu-ragu dan supaya orang-orang yang di dalam hatinya ada penyakit dan orang-orang kafir (mengatakan): "Apakah yang dikehendaki Allah dengan bilangan ini sebagai suatu perumpamaan?" Demikianlah Allah membiarkan sesat orang-orang yang dikehendaki-Nya dan memberi petunjuk kepada siapa yang dikehendaki-Nya. Dan tidak ada yang mengetahui tentara Tuhanmu melainkan Dia sendiri. Dan Saqar itu tiada lain hanyalah peringatan bagi manusia.
Indonesian.verse 74:35: Sesungguhnya Saqar itu adalah salah satu bencana yang amat besar,
Indonesian.verse 74:37: (Yaitu) bagi siapa di antaramu yang berkehendak akan maju atau mundur.
Indonesian.verse 74:38: Tiap-tiap diri bertanggung jawab atas apa yang telah diperbuatnya,
Indonesian.verse 74:40: berada di dalam surga, mereka tanya menanya,
Indonesian.verse 74:42: "Apakah yang memasukkan kamu ke dalam Saqar (neraka)?"
Indonesian.verse 74:43: Mereka menjawab: "Kami dahulu tidak termasuk orang-orang yang mengerjakan shalat,
Indonesian.verse 74:44: dan kami tidak (pula) memberi makan orang miskin,
Indonesian.verse 74:45: dan adalah kami membicarakan yang bathil, bersama dengan orang-orang yang membicarakannya,
Indonesian.verse 74:46: dan adalah kami mendustakan hari pembalasan,
Indonesian.verse 74:48: Maka tidak berguna lagi bagi mereka syafa'at dari orang-orang yang memberikan syafa'at.
Indonesian.verse 74:49: Maka mengapa mereka (orang-orang kafir) berpaling dari peringatan (Allah)?,
Indonesian.verse 74:50: seakan-akan mereka itu keledai liar yang lari terkejut,
Indonesian.verse 74:52: Bahkan tiap-tiap orang dari mereka berkehendak supaya diberikan kepadanya lembaran-lembaran yang terbuka.
Indonesian.verse 74:53: Sekali-kali tidak. Sebenarnya mereka tidak takut kepada negeri akhirat.
Indonesian.verse 74:54: Sekali-kali tidak demikian halnya. Sesungguhnya Al Quran itu adalah peringatan.
Indonesian.verse 74:55: Maka barangsiapa menghendaki, niscaya dia mengambil pelajaran daripadanya (Al Quran).
Indonesian.verse 74:56: Dan mereka tidak akan mengambil pelajaran daripadanya kecuali (jika) Allah menghendakinya. Dia (Allah) adalah Tuhan Yang patut (kita) bertakwa kepada-Nya dan berhak memberi ampun.

Italian.verse 74:1: O tu che sei avvolto nel mantello,
Italian.verse 74:6: Non dar nulla sperando di ricevere di più,
Italian.verse 74:7: ma sopporta con pazienza per il tuo Signore!
Italian.verse 74:10: niente affatto facile per i miscredenti.
Italian.verse 74:11: LasciaMi solo con colui che ho creato,
Italian.verse 74:12: cui ho concesso abbondanza di beni,
Italian.verse 74:14: al quale ho facilitato ogni cosa,
Italian.verse 74:15: e che ancora desidera che gli dia di più.
Italian.verse 74:16: No, invero è stato refrattario ai Nostri segni:
Italian.verse 74:17: lo costringerò a una dura salita.
Italian.verse 74:20: sì, perisca per come l'ha definito!
Italian.verse 74:23: Ha volto le spalle, si è fatto altero
Italian.verse 74:24: e ha detto: “Questo non è che magia appresa;
Italian.verse 74:25: non è altro che un discorso di un uomo”.
Italian.verse 74:26: Lo getterò nel Calore che brucia.
Italian.verse 74:27: Chi mai ti dirà cos'è il Calore che brucia?
Italian.verse 74:31: Non ponemmo che angeli a guardia del fuoco, fissando il loro numero solo per tentare i miscredenti affinché credessero con fermezza quelli cui è stato dato il Libro e aumentasse la fede dei credenti e non dubitassero coloro cui è stata data la Scrittura e i credenti, e affinché coloro che hanno morbo nel cuore e i miscredenti dicessero: “Cosa vuol significare Allah con questa metafora?”. È così che Allah travia chi vuole e guida chi vuole.Non conosce le truppe del tuo Signore altri che Lui.
Italian.verse 74:33: per la notte quando volge al termine,
Italian.verse 74:34: e per l'aurora quando si mostra,
Italian.verse 74:35: [il Calore è davvero uno dei segni più grandi,
Italian.verse 74:37: per chi di voi vuole avanzare [nella fede] o indietreggiare.
Italian.verse 74:38: Ogni anima è pegno di quello che ha compiuto,
Italian.verse 74:40: [saranno] nei Giardini e si interpelleranno a vicenda
Italian.verse 74:42: “Cosa mai vi ha condotti al Calore che brucia?”.
Italian.verse 74:43: Risponderanno: “Non eravamo tra coloro che eseguivamo l'orazione,
Italian.verse 74:45: e chiacchieravamo vanamente con i chiacchieroni
Italian.verse 74:46: e tacciavamo di menzogna il Giorno del Giudizio,
Italian.verse 74:47: finché non ci pervenne la certezza”.
Italian.verse 74:48: Non gioverà loro l'intercessione di intercessori.
Italian.verse 74:49: Ma perché mai si scostano dal Monito?
Italian.verse 74:51: che fuggono davanti a un leone!
Italian.verse 74:52: Ciascuno di loro vorrebbe che gli fossero dati fogli dispiegati.
Italian.verse 74:53: No, non hanno invece alcun timore dell'altra vita!
Italian.verse 74:54: No, in verità questo è un Monito.
Italian.verse 74:55: Se ne ricordi dunque chi vuole.
Italian.verse 74:56: Ma non se ne ricorderanno altrimenti che se Allah vuole. Egli è il più Degno di essere temuto, è il Detentore del perdono.

Japanese.verse 74:2: 立ち上って警告しなさい。
Japanese.verse 74:3: あなたの主を讃えなさい。
Japanese.verse 74:4: またあなたの衣を清潔に保ちなさい。
Japanese.verse 74:6: 見返りを期待して施してはならない。
Japanese.verse 74:7: あなたの主の（道の）ために，耐え忍びなさい。
Japanese.verse 74:10: 不信者たちにとり，安らぎのない（日である）。
Japanese.verse 74:11: われが創った者を，われ一人に任せなさい。
Japanese.verse 74:12: われは，かれに豊かな富を授け，
Japanese.verse 74:13: またその回りに，息子たちを侍らせ，
Japanese.verse 74:14: かれのために，（物事を）円満容易にした。
Japanese.verse 74:15: それでもかれは，われが更に豊かにするよう欲した。
Japanese.verse 74:16: 断じて許されない。かれは，わが印に対し頑迷であった。
Japanese.verse 74:17: やがてわれは，酪い痛苦でかれを悩ますであろう。
Japanese.verse 74:18: かれは想を練り，策謀した。
Japanese.verse 74:19: かれは滅びるであろう。何と（惑意をもって）かれらは策謀したことよ。
Japanese.verse 74:20: 重ねていう。かれは滅びるであろう。何とかれは策謀したことよ。
Japanese.verse 74:21: その時，かれはちらっと（クルアーンを）眺め，
Japanese.verse 74:22: 眉をひそめ，苦い顔をして，
Japanese.verse 74:23: それから，高慢に背を向けて去った。
Japanese.verse 74:24: かれは言った。「これは昔からの魔術に過ぎません。
Japanese.verse 74:25: どうみても人間の言葉に過ぎません。」
Japanese.verse 74:26: やがてわれは地獄の火て，かれを焼くであろう。
Japanese.verse 74:27: 地獄の火が何であるかを，あなたに理解させるものは何か。
Japanese.verse 74:28: それは何ものも免れさせず，また何ものも残さない。
Japanese.verse 74:29: 人の皮膚を，黒く焦がす。
Japanese.verse 74:30: その上には19（の天使が看守る）。
Japanese.verse 74:31: われが業火の看守として，天使たちの外に誰も命じなかった。またかれらの数を限定したことは，不信心の者たちに対する一つの試みに過ぎない。（それにより）啓典を授けられた者たちを確信させ，また信じる者の信仰を深めるためである。また啓典を授けられた者や信者たちが，疑いを残さず，またその心に病の宿る者や，不信者たちに，「アッラーはこの比喩で，何を御望みになるのでしょうか。」と言わせるためである。このようにアッラーは，御自分の望みの者を迷わせ，また望みの者を導かれる。そしてかれの外誰もあなたの主の軍勢を知らないのである。本当にこれは人間に対する訓戒に外ならない。
Japanese.verse 74:33: 退こうとする，夜に誓けて，
Japanese.verse 74:34: また輝こうとする，暁に誓けて（誓う）。
Japanese.verse 74:35: それは大きな（徴の）一つであり，
Japanese.verse 74:37: あなたがたの中，前に進むことを望む者，また後に残ることを願う者への（警告である）。
Japanese.verse 74:38: それぞれの魂は，その行ったことに対し，（アッラーに）担保を提供している。
Japanese.verse 74:39: 右手の仲間は別である。
Japanese.verse 74:40: （かれらは）楽園の中にいて，互いに尋ね合うであろう。
Japanese.verse 74:41: 罪を犯した者たちに就いて，
Japanese.verse 74:42: 「何が，あなたがたを烈火の中に導いたのですか。」と。
Japanese.verse 74:43: かれらは（答えて）言う。「わたしたちは礼拝を捧げていませんでした。
Japanese.verse 74:44: わたしたちはまた，貧者を養いませんでした。
Japanese.verse 74:45: わたしたちは空論の徒と共に無駄話に耽り，
Japanese.verse 74:46: 常に審判の日を否定していました。
Japanese.verse 74:47: 遂に真実が，わたしたちに到来しました。」
Japanese.verse 74:48: それで執り成す者の執り成しも，かれらに役立たないであろう。
Japanese.verse 74:49: 一体訓戒から背き去るとは，かれらはどうしたのであろう。
Japanese.verse 74:50: かれらは丁度獅子を見て恐怖に陥ったロバのように，
Japanese.verse 74:51: 一目散に逃げ出すかのようであった。
Japanese.verse 74:52: いや，かれらはそれぞれ開かれた書巻が授けられることを望んでいる。
Japanese.verse 74:53: いや断してそうではない。かれらは来世を恐れていないのである。
Japanese.verse 74:54: いや，これは正に訓戒である。
Japanese.verse 74:55: だから誰でも欲する者には，それを肝に銘じさせなさい。
Japanese.verse 74:56: だが，アッラーが望まれる者の外は，留意しないであろう。かれは畏るべき御方よく許して下される御方である。

Jawa.verse 74:1: wengi. Lan shabatira sagolongan hiya padha mangkono. Allah nemtokake dawa cendhake rina lan wengi, nguningani yen sira padha ora kelar sholat samono suwene mau kajaba kelawan rekasa, mulane Allah muwung marang sira. Sarehne mangkono sira macaa al-Quran sakuwasanira ana sajerone sholat. Allah nguningani yen sira iku bakal ana kang nandhang lara banjur rekasa sholat ing wayah wengi lan ana uga kang padha mlaku lelungan ing bumi ngupaya jiwa golek rizki kanugrahaning Allah lan ana uga kang padha perang ing dalaning Allah, mulane sira padhaa maca al-Quran sakuwasanira lan ngakonana sholat, bayar zakat, padha motangna becik marang Allah. Samu barang kabecikan kang padha sira lakoni bakal nemu ganjran becik ana ngarsaning Allah ngungkuli kabecikan kang sira lakoni ing buri. Lan nyuwuna pangapuraning Allah, satemene Allah iku karsa ngapura tur maha asih. . He wong kang mujung (Muhammad)
Jawa.verse 74:3: Lan nyebuta Maha Agung ing Allah Pangeranira
Jawa.verse 74:6: Lan aja weweh murih wewales kang luwih akeh
Jawa.verse 74:7: Lan sabara karana ngelakoni parentahe Pangeranira
Jawa.verse 74:9: Ing dina iku kena diarani dina rekasa
Jawa.verse 74:10: TUmrap engatase para wong kafir ora pisan gampang
Jawa.verse 74:11: Tona wae Ingsun dheweke karo wong kang wus Ingsun titahake
Jawa.verse 74:12: Lan wis Ingsun paringi bandha kang omber
Jawa.verse 74:13: Uga Ingsun paringin anak lanang akeh padha nglumpuk
Jawa.verse 74:14: Tuwin perkarane Ingsun tata sarwa tumata
Jawa.verse 74:15: Ewa dene dheweke isih angajab Ingsun wuwuhana
Jawa.verse 74:16: Ora pisan - pisan! Sayekti dheweke amilawani timbalan - timbalan Ingsun
Jawa.verse 74:17: Ingsun bakal anibakake siksa kang nyusahake marang dheweke
Jawa.verse 74:18: Sayekti, dheweke mikir - mikir sarta anetepake
Jawa.verse 74:19: Ananging marga siniku, kapriye anggone netepake
Jawa.verse 74:20: Maneh, muga siniku kapriye anggone netepake
Jawa.verse 74:24: Banjur celathu, "Al-Quran iki ora liya kajaba sihir kang disinau (saka wong - wong biyen)
Jawa.verse 74:25: (Al-Quran) iki ora liya mung pangucaping manungsa wae
Jawa.verse 74:26: Dheweke bakal Ingsun cemplungake neraka saqar
Jawa.verse 74:27: Kapriye panemunira, apa kang aran neraka saqar
Jawa.verse 74:28: Neraka saqar mau ora ngawetake, sadhengah kang kacemplung ing kono mesthi rusak
Jawa.verse 74:31: Lan ora liya kajaba Malaikat kang Ingsun dadekake panjaganing geni, sarta wilangane iku ora liya kajaba mung Ingsun dadekake coba tumrap wong kang padha kafir, supaya para kang kaparingan Kitab padha yakin, sarta para kang padha iman pada wuwuh imane, apa dene (supaya) ora padha semang - semang para kang kaparingan kitab lan para mukminin, sarta supaya para kang sajeroning atine ana lelarane sarta para kafir padha elathir: apa ta kersaning Allah andamel sanepa iki? Iya kaya mangkono iku anggone Allah andadekake sasare sapa kang dadi karsane, sarta aparing pituduh (marang) sapa sing dadi kersane, lan ora ana kang weruh wedyabalane Pangeranira kajaba mung Panjenengane, lan iki ora liya kajaba pepeling tumrap para manungsa
Jawa.verse 74:32: Demi rembulan, wong kafir ora pisan ngistokake wewulanging al-Quran
Jawa.verse 74:35: Temen neraka Saqar iku ewone bebaya kang gedhe
Jawa.verse 74:37: Tumrap wong kancanira kang arep maju pracaya (al-Quran) utawa mundur ora pracaya
Jawa.verse 74:38: Sarupaning awak iku kaiket (tanggung jawab) karo sabarang panggawene
Jawa.verse 74:39: Kajaba para kang ana ing tangan tengen
Jawa.verse 74:40: Ana sajeroning patamanan bakal padha takon - takon
Jawa.verse 74:42: Punapa marganipun sampeyan wonten ing salebeting neraka
Jawa.verse 74:43: Bakal padha mangsuli, "Kula punika sanes golonganipun tiyang ingkang sami sholat
Jawa.verse 74:44: Lan kula boten nate nyukani tedha tiyang miskin
Jawa.verse 74:45: Sarta damel kula omong lelahanan kaliyan tiyang ingkang damelipun omong lelahanan
Jawa.verse 74:46: Sarta kula punika mahiben badhe kalampahipun dinten piwale
Jawa.verse 74:48: (Pangendikaning Allah) Mulane syafa’ate para juru syafaat ora bakal migunani marang dheweke
Jawa.verse 74:49: Lan apa ta pakolehe anggone wong mau padha lumuh nistakake saka pepeling (al-Quran)
Jawa.verse 74:50: Kaya dene kuldi (keledai liar) kang kaget
Jawa.verse 74:52: Balik dheweke, siji - sijine padha angajab diparingana dhewe - dhewe lembaran kang ginelar
Jawa.verse 74:53: Ora bakal (dipituruti panjaluke) balik dheweke padha ora wedi marang akherat
Jawa.verse 74:55: Lah sapa sing gelem, angelangana iku
Jawa.verse 74:56: Lan ora bakal padha angelingi, kejaba sing dadi kaparenging Allah. Panjenengane iku panthes diestokake dhawuhe lan pantes aparing pangapura

Kazakh.verse 74:6: Әрі жақсылықты көп болып қайтуы үшін жасама
Kazakh.verse 74:11: Ей, Мұхаммед! Жалғыз етіп жаратқанымды Өзіме қалдыр
Kazakh.verse 74:15: Содан кейін де ол Менің арттыра түсуімді қалайды
Kazakh.verse 74:16: Жоқ, олай болмайды! Ақиқатында, ол аяттарымызға қарсы қасарысушы еді
Kazakh.verse 74:20: Содан кейін тағы жойылғыр, ол қалай есептеді
Kazakh.verse 74:22: Содан кейін қабағын шытып, бетін тыржитты
Kazakh.verse 74:23: Одан соң теріс айналып, өзін жоғары санап, менменсіп
Kazakh.verse 74:24: «Бұл айтылып келе жатқан сиқырдан басқа ештеңе емес
Kazakh.verse 74:25: Бұл бар болғаны адамның сөзі», деді
Kazakh.verse 74:27: Сақардың не екенін саған не білдірді
Kazakh.verse 74:31: Біз тозақ сақшыларын періштелерден ғана қылдық. Әрі олардың санын сондай күпірлік етушілер имансыздар үшін бір сынақ еттік. Бұл Кітап берілгендердің көздері жетуі, имандылардың иманы артуы үшін және Кітап берілгендер мен имандылардың күмәнданбауы үшін. Сондай-ақ жүректерінде дерті барлар мен кәпірлер: «Аллаһ бұл мысалмен нені қалады?!» деп айтуы үшін. Осылай, Аллаһ кімді қаласа адастырып, кімді қаласа тура жолға салады. Раббыңның әскерін Одан басқа ешкім білмейді. бұл адамзат үшін бір Еске салудан басқа еш нәрсе емес
Kazakh.verse 74:35: Ақиқатында, ол тозақ өте үлкендердің құбылыстардың бірі
Kazakh.verse 74:37: сендерден алға жүруді немесе артқа шегінуді қалағандар үшін
Kazakh.verse 74:38: Әрбір жан істеп тапқанының амалының тұтқыны
Kazakh.verse 74:42: Тозаққа түскендерге : «Сендерді Сақарға тозаққа не кіргізді?» дейді
Kazakh.verse 74:45: және бос, өтірік сөздерге батушылармен бірге батушы едік
Kazakh.verse 74:46: және Есеп қиямет күнін өтірік санауда болдық
Kazakh.verse 74:47: бізге айқын нәрсе өлім келгенге дейін», дейді
Kazakh.verse 74:48: Сонда оларға араға түсушілердің шапағат етушілердің араға түсуі пайда бермейді
Kazakh.verse 74:49: Оларға не болды, Еске салатыннан Құраннан бет бұратындай
Kazakh.verse 74:50: бейне бір үріккен жабайы есектер тәрізді
Kazakh.verse 74:52: Негізінде, олардың әрбірі өзіне ашық жазбалардың берілуін қалайды
Kazakh.verse 74:53: Жоқ, керісінше, олар соңғы, мәңгілік өмірден ақиреттен қорықпайды
Kazakh.verse 74:54: Жоқ, олай емес! Анығында, бұл бір еске салу, ескерту
Kazakh.verse 74:56: Алайда олар Аллаһ қаламаса, есіне алмайды. Ол жазасынан қорқуға лайықты әрі кешірім Иесі

Korean.verse 74:3: 그대 주님의 위대함을 찬양하고그리고 그대 주님만을 찬양하고
Korean.verse 74:4: 그대의 옷은 정화하며그대의 망투를 청결케 할 것 이며
Korean.verse 74:6: 그리고 더 많이 받으려 은혜를 베풀지 말며필요 이상의 것을 주지 말며
Korean.verse 74:7: 그대 주님을 위해 인내하라주님을 위해 인내하라
Korean.verse 74:8: 그리하여 나팔이 불릴 때나팔이 부는 그때
Korean.verse 74:9: 실로 그날은 어려운 날이라그날은 곧 재앙의 날이 될 것이라
Korean.verse 74:10: 불신자들에게 쉽지 않은 날이라그것은 불신자들을 위한 것 으로 평탄한 것이 아니라
Korean.verse 74:11: 그대는 나와 내가 홀몸으로 창조한 자를 놓아두라내가 홀로 창조한 그를 내게맡기라
Korean.verse 74:12: 나는 그를 위해 즐비한 재산을 두었고실로 나는 그에게 풍성함을 베풀어 주었고
Korean.verse 74:13: 함께 하는 자손들을 두었노라자손들이 그와 함께 거주하 게 하였으니
Korean.verse 74:14: 그리고 나는 그를 위해 많은 것을 펼쳐 주었노라내가 그에게 안락한 생활을 베풀었노라
Korean.verse 74:15: 그 후에도 그는 내가 더해 주기를 희망하더라그런데도 그는 내가 더하여 주기를 바라고 있느뇨
Korean.verse 74:16: 그렇지 않노라. 실로 그는 나의 징표에 대해 고집부리는 자였노라결코 그렇게 될 수 없나니 하나님의 예증들을 거역하였노라
Korean.verse 74:17: 나는 그에게 고된 벌이 덮치게 할 것이라곧 내가 그에게 산더미 같은재앙들을 가져다 주리라
Korean.verse 74:18: 실로 그는 생각하고 재더라그는 숙고하고서도 음모하 였으니
Korean.verse 74:19: 그러니 그가 재는 방법에 저주가 있노라음모한 그에게 재앙이 있으 리라
Korean.verse 74:20: 다시 한번, 그가 재는 방법에 저주가 있노라그러하니라 음모하는 자에게재앙이 있을 것이라
Korean.verse 74:21: 그 후 그는 보았고그런 후 그는 생각하고
Korean.verse 74:22: 그 후 그는 얼굴을 찌푸리고 찡그렸노라눈살을 찌푸리고 불쾌한 표 정을 하더라
Korean.verse 74:23: 그 후 그는 꽁무니를 빼며 거만해 하였노라외면하며 오만해 하더라
Korean.verse 74:24: 그리하여 그가 말하길 : "이것은 오직 전해져 내려오는 주술일 뿐이라이것은 옛 선조들로부터 유 래된 마술에 불과하다고 말하고
Korean.verse 74:25: 이것은 오직 인간의 말일 뿐이라이것은 한 인간의 말에 불과하다고 하였더라
Korean.verse 74:26: 나는 그를 뜨거운 불지옥으로 태울 것이라그러므로 내가 곧 그를 볼지옥으로 이르게 하리라
Korean.verse 74:27: 무엇이 그대에게 뜨거운 불지옥이 무엇인지를 알려 줄 것인가그 불지옥이 무엇인지 무엇 이 그대에게 설명하여 주리요
Korean.verse 74:28: 그것은 남겨두지도 않으며 내버려두지도 않으며그것은 아무것도 남기지 아 니하면 어느 누구도 남겨두지 아 니한 곳으로
Korean.verse 74:30: 열아홉이 그것을 책임지노라그 위에는 열 아홉이 있노라
Korean.verse 74:31: 나는 불지옥의 관리자들을 오직 천사들로만 두었으며, 나는 그들의 숫자를 오직 불신하는 자들에 대한 시험으로 두었노라. 그리하여 성서를 받은 자들이 확신을 얻고, 믿는 자들이 믿음이 증가되며, 성서를 받은 자들과 신앙인들이 의심하지 않기 위함이라. 그러나 마음 속에 병이 있는 자들과 불신자들은 이 비유로써 하나님이 원하는 것은 무엇인가? 라고 말하더라. 그렇게 하나님께서는 그분께서 원하시는 자를 방황시키시고 그분께서 원하시는 자를 인도하시노라. 오직 그분만이 그대 주님의 군대를 알고 계시노라. 그것(불지옥)은 다름 아닌 인간을 위한 떠올림이라하나님은 천사들을 불지옥의수호자들로 두었노라 그 숫자를 둔 것은 믿지 아니한 불신자들을 위한 시련으로써 그리고 성서의 백성들을 확신시키고 믿는 사람들의 신앙을 더하며 성서의 백성들 과 믿는 신도들이 의심하지 아니 하고 마음이 병든 자들과 불신자 들이 하나님은 이 비유로 무엇을 의도하려 하느뇨 라고 말하는 그 들을 시험하기 위해서라 이렇듯 하나님은 그분이 원하는 자를 방 황케 하사 그분이 원하는 자를 인도하시니 그분 외에는 어느 누구 도 주님의 수호자들을 알 수 없 노라 이것은 인간을 위한 교훈에 불과하니라
Korean.verse 74:32: 그렇지 않노라. 달을 두고 맹세코달을 두고 맹세하사
Korean.verse 74:33: 자취를 감출 때의 밤을 두고 맹세코사라져 가는 밤을 두고 맹세하며
Korean.verse 74:34: 밝아올 때의 아침을 두고 맹세코빛나는 아침을 두고 맹세하 나니
Korean.verse 74:35: 진실로 그것(불지옥)은 어마한 것 중의 하나이며실로 그것은 가장 중대한 재앙 중의 하나라
Korean.verse 74:36: 인간을 위한 경고이니그것은 인간을 위한 하나의 경고로
Korean.verse 74:37: 그대들 중에서 앞으로 나아가거나 혹은 뒤로 물러서고자 하는 자를 위한 것이라너희 중에 앞서려는 자와 유예하려는 자들을 위한 것이라
Korean.verse 74:38: 모든 영혼은 그가 얻은 것으로 전당 잡혀 있노라모든 인간은 그가 행한 행위 에 의해 저당이 되나
Korean.verse 74:39: 그러나 우편의 거주자들은 예외라우편의 동료들은 제외로
Korean.verse 74:40: 천국에서 그들은 서로 물으니이들은 천국으로 들어가 서 로가 서로에게 질문을 하며
Korean.verse 74:41: 악행을 저지른 자들에 관해서라죄인들에 관하여 묻고
Korean.verse 74:42: 무엇이 그대들을 뜨거운 불지옥에 들게 하였는가무엇이 너희로 하여금 불지 옥에 들게 하였느뇨 라고 물으니
Korean.verse 74:43: 그들이 말하길 : "우리는 예배 드리는 자들이 아니었고그들은 대답하길 저희는 예 배하는 자 중에 있지 아니하였으 며
Korean.verse 74:44: 불우한 자들에게 음식을 주지도 않았소가난한 사람들에게 자선을 베풀지 아니하고
Korean.verse 74:45: 우리는 노닥이는 자들과 함께 노닥였고무익한 잡담을 하는 자들과 공론을 하곤 했으며
Korean.verse 74:46: 심판의 날을 부정하였으니”심판의 날을 믿지 않고
Korean.verse 74:47: 우리에게 죽음이 찾아올 때까지 그러하였소심판의 날이 온다는 것을 부 인하였습니까
Korean.verse 74:48: 그러니 중재자들의 중재도 그들에게는 소용이 없노라그리하여 어떤 중재자들의 중재도 그들에게 유용하지 못하리라
Korean.verse 74:49: 그럼에도 그들은 떠올림에 등을 돌리는 자들이니 이 어찌 된 일인가교훈을 거역한 그들이 어떻 게 되었느뇨
Korean.verse 74:50: 그들은 마치 달음질치는 당나귀들과 같으니그들은 마치 놀란 당나귀들 이
Korean.verse 74:51: 사자로부터 도망치는 당나귀들이라한마리의 사자에 놀라 도망 치는 것과 같더라
Korean.verse 74:52: 실로 그들 중의 모든 이는 펼쳐진 책자를 받길 원하더라실로 이들 각자는 펼쳐진 성서가 그들에게도 내려지기를 원하고 있느뇨
Korean.verse 74:53: 결코 그렇지 않노라! 그들은 내세를 두려워하지 않노라그것은 불가능한 것으로 그 들은 내세를 두려워 하지 않노라
Korean.verse 74:54: 그렇지 않노라. 실로 그것(꾸란)은 떠올림이라실로 이것이 교훈이니
Korean.verse 74:55: 그렇기에, 원하는 자는 그것(꾸란)을 떠올리노라그것을 지키려 하는 자 그것을 기억케 하리라
Korean.verse 74:56: 그들은 오직 하나님께서 원하실 때만 떠올릴 것이라. 그분께서는 경외심을 받으실 분이며 용서의 권리를 가지시는 분이라그러나 하나님이 원하는 자 외에는 어느 누구도 그것을 기억 하려 하지 아니 하리라 그분은 두려워 해야 할 주님이요 관용의 주님이시라

Kurdish.verse 74:1: Yê xwe di kinca da pêcayîئه‌ی ئه‌و که‌سه‌ی خۆت پێچاوه‌ته‌وه‌، ئه‌ی محمد صلی الله علیه وسلم
